Job Description:
1.Lead, manage, and develop a high-performance sales team that exceeds targets and goals on a regular basis.
2.Coaching & Training team to be stronger, confidently follow the company sales process with every customer they engage with. Help struggling sales consultants to close deals 
3.Set individual sales targets with team members and hold them accountable to achieve their targets
4.Model expert sales techniques to the team and take the lead to onboard new sales consultants through robust and dynamic training.
5.Ensure all sales consultants are using the CRM (customer relationship management) tool effectively and accurately.
6.Ensure all sales consultants are maximizing their time at work by spending their time prospecting for new customers, following up with leads, or meeting with customers in person.
7.Recruit, grow, and support and effective network of independent sales agents.
8.Work closely with the CEO to establish effective sales targets, strategies, and action plans for the entire Sales Department.

Job Description:
Job Summary: 
The role is to provide end-user support and execute various maintenance on the Core Banking System. 


Job Responsibilities:

-Provide leadership in a variety of planning and development activities, for the purpose of creating short and long term plans for providing support to the business
-Perform analysis and assessment of business needs and requirements versus system support
-Provide Core Banking System parameterization according to the user requests as well as a regular periodic parameterization
-Create new branches, products, features, modules in the core banking system upon request
Identify, analyze and report occurred and potential user and/or system problems as well as coordinate with the software vendor for solutions, including troubleshooting, root cause analysis and implementing bug fixes
-Support system upgrades, new features and/or product test, and apply fixes/patches
-Coordinate DRP/BCP of core banking system testing and provide reports for ensuring compliance to comply with IT policy
-Assist in delivering system solutions and implement projects to meet business, operation and compliance objectives
-Provide application support to achieve a target level of availability thus requiring incumbent to track problems and ensure speedy resolution either internally or by the vendor in order to minimize disruption to business operations
-Provide leadership to other CBS unit staff in ensuring services are delivered
-Review vendor contracts and assist in negotiation with vendors for the purpose of providing  the bank cost-effective and reliable services
-Ensure compliance with bank and regulator requirements during the implementation of various CBS related services for the bank
-Be a core member for all IT project implementation groups, coordinating execution of CBS related activities
-Perform change management risk reviews and post-implementation reviews for all change requests
-Proactively monitoring CBS & Core Apps services to ensure compliance of all users and services, and providing periodic (daily, weekly, monthly, quarterly) MIS reports to the Head of IT
-Regularly review and update CBS & Core Apps related policies, standards, and operating procedures, while enforcing departmental and organization wise compliance to the IT management policies
-Work closely with data entry and teller to ensure that they can finish their tasks before the close of business
-Ensure the quality of functional specifications developed and quality of System Integration Test performed by the development team before handover to the User Acceptance Test (UAT)
Job Requirement:
Skills and Qualifications:

-At least Bachelor Degree in IT, Computer Science or in a related field 
-Knowledge of Flex Cube, ODBX and/or other known Core Banking systems 
-Knowledge of SDLC and ITIL 
-Around 3 years of working experience in a related field 
-Preferably proven experiences in an agile environment 
-Technical knowledge skills, theory, document management 
-Highly result-oriented 
-Ability to meet tight deadlines 
-Good analytical, technical, written, and communication skills.

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY

This role is responsible for managing the end-to-end of IT project management lifecycle and will serve as a liaison between the business and technical aspects of assigned projects. Communication and keeps stakeholders inform during all phases of the project, and close it efficiently.

JOB RESPONSIBLE

-Establish, implement and improve an IT Project Management policies, procedures and standard within bank
-Provide leadership to the IT Project Management department
Liaise with stakeholders such as project personnel, vendors, and end-users regarding project requirements to define, and initiate project scope and objectives
-Prepare budget and proposal based on scope and objective that including objectives, technologies, business process, data flow and specifications, timelines, funding, and staffing
-Lead/coordinate all necessary meetings to facilitate selection of project solutions, services and products
-Manage contracts with vendors and suppliers by assigning tasks and communicating expected deliverables
-Provide project updates on a consistent basis to various stakeholders about strategy, adjustments, and progress
-Monitoring expenditures in accordance with the budget
-Maintain all documents of project delivery lifecycle
-Measure project performance to identify areas for improvement
-Ensure projects implementation are complied with bank policies, procedures and standards.
-Keep update on digital transformation landscape in order to identify risk and opportunities to improve the bank’s IT and digital landscape
-Perform other task assigned by management
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENT

-Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Business or other related equivalence
-Project Management Professional (PMP) certification preferred
-Experience in Bank industry/Business solution at least 5+ years
-Experience 3+ as a person responsible for IT project management and managing internal stakeholders
-Thorough understanding of project management principles and planning
-Thorough understanding of governance, compliance and risk in the IT context
-Understanding of software development life cycle
Demonstrate strong strategic thinking, analytical and leadership skills.
-Strong problem-solving skills, with ability to influence others.
-Demonstrable strategic thinking, analytical and problem-solving skills and detail oriented.
-Leadership skills, conflict resolution, and well organizing the tasks

Job Description:
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Execute on all phases of the UX/UI design process — from helping to evaluate user stories and collecting user feedback to creating user flows, lo-fi/hi-fi wireframing and prototyping, and designing highly professional visuals
-Maintain aesthetic coherence across the design system working to find meaningful expressions within brand guidelines and visual identity for each product
-Create visually striking UI design, fitting the brand aesthetics and design standards while incorporating usability findings, feedback and metrics
-Transform technical insights into informed user-centric design decisions and create complete documentation on flows and interactions
-Provide quality assurance of all deliverables within the required design standards
-Follow an iterative development timeline to ensure tasks are being completed on time
-Conduct Foundational Research to ensure the product fits Digital Banking Market in Cambodia
-Design Testing Strategies such as moderated and unmoderated usability studies, card sorting, A/B Testing,
-Understanding Emotional Designs
-Perform analysis to help drive UX optimization and efficiency
-Develop deep relationships within the organization to understand the needs and establish strong user-centric brand-aligned solutions throughout the business
-Collaborate in cross-functional capacities with the UX, engineering, creative, and marketing teams, to build concepts, graphics and layouts for our products
-Collaborate with Marketing Team to do develop digital marketing campaigns, poster, etc.
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENTS & SKILLS: 

-Initiate new ideas to that benefit user experiences and create business revenue.
-Create and Maintain Cross-Design System that could extends to web and mobile platforms
-Present UX/UI to stakeholders and defend your designs with research findings and design principles.
-Maintain a positive attitude while giving and receiving constructive criticism to make improvements and take appropriate corrective actions with a high level of empathy and understanding for various people, positions, and cultures.

Job Description:
JOB SUMMARY:

We are looking for a highly skilled senior Java developer to join our bank. In this role, you will design, create, and implement various Java-based solutions for the business that will range from digital middleware to database programming. 

To be successful as a senior Java developer, you should have a specialist level of understanding and skill in developing a broad range of applications and proprietary solutions. A top-notch senior Java developer will be comfortable working independently and be able to deliver top-quality, error-free work on time.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:

-Designing, creating, and implementing Java-based applications.
-Interpreting briefs to create high-quality coding that functions according to specifications.
-Determining application functions and building objectives with the team.
-Ensuring that written code falls in line with the project objectives.
-Problem-solving with other team members in the project.
-Identifying and resolving immediate and potential issues with applications.
-Drafting detailed reports on the work performed and projects completed.
-Participating in group meetings to discuss projects and objectives.
-Assisting other developers with troubleshooting, debugging, and coding.
-Meeting deadlines on fast-paced deliverables.
Job Requirement:
JOB REQUIREMENTS & SKILLS: 

-Degree in computer sciences, coding, or a related field.
-At least 5-6 years experience in Java-based programming.
Significant coding skills in Java, with other languages being a major plus.
-Knowledge of current frameworks, SDKs, APIs, and libraries.
-Excellent written and verbal communication.
-Good organizational and time-management skills.
-A strong portfolio of top-class coding and builds to your name.
-Ability to work with other developers and assist junior team members.
-Meticulous at both analysis and execution.
-Exceptional problem-solving and analytical abilities.

job title: Director of Human Resources and Organisation Development  (HROD)
position: Director of Human Resources and Organisation Development  (HROD)
Job Description:
* Job Summary

The Director of HROD drives GSC support and development in the areas of HR, OD and internal communication in the region, in order to support the achievement of organizational goals. He/she supervises close work with Member Associations (MAs) to build their capacity
and to support the implementation of HR and OD strategic objectives and international policies in the MA. He/she leads the HROD network in the region and works towards a flawless roll out and execution of global policies, processes and projects and their translation into regional
requirements where necessary.

* Job Responsibility

- Drive, implement and monitor implementation of HR strategy, HR policies, and guidelines in regional office and MAs and contribute to develop them further.
 Ensure roll-out and monitoring of SOS compensation system in Regional Offices (ROS) and MAs .
-  Drive strategic workforce planning in MAs and in the region.
- Support the International Director, Region with expertise, consultancy and controlling in the areas of human resources and organization development in MAs and GSC offices .
- Responsible for supporting MAs to meet international HRD quality standards & guidelines Responsible for leading, developing, and supporting the regional HROD network consisting of national, regional HROD co-workers, supporting cross- national knowledge sharing, steering regional and national developments and ensuring capacity building of co-workers in HR & OD.
- Build up HR competence for line management on regional as well as national level
- Ensure capacity building for program co-workers in MAs
- Recruit regional management in line with management team approved process.
- Implement performance management and recruiting standards in regions and MAs and monitor implementation
- Eensure Co-worker orientation, roll-out of Code of Conduct and monitoring of its implementation.
- Drive and implement people and cultural change agenda in regions and MAS
- Adapt international HR concepts to local needs and implement support actions where needed.
-  Support Regional Director and SOS Children's Villages International Representative in the development of good governance implementation in MAS and contribute to develop them further.
- Drive implementation of good management and accountability standards in MAs and CVI units.
- Support the establishment of national legal entities and the registration and change of national statutes.
-  Ensure monitoring of local legal compliance and recommend actions to National Directors/ Boards. Accompany and support management in OD processes on regional and national level.
-  Ensure regular HR reporting and maintenance of data for regional needs
- Ensure development, roll out and operation of regional and local systems/ database, applications in close cooperation with regional Information & Communication Technology (ICT) and in line with SOS standards for software development.
- Ensure HR administration in the Regional Office
- Consult and build capacity in regional office and MAs
- Lead the team of co-workers in the function in the region, managing the performance and ensuring development of direct reports.
Job Requirement:
- Graduated BBA/MBA of Human Resource Management or Business
Administration.
- Good knowledge of local laws, employment rules & latest HR practices.
- Should have minimum work experiences of 5-6 years in human resources with 3-4 years at middle management level either in corporate or not for profit organization.
- A minimum of five years of professional experience with NGOs, UN agency or private
- Leadership and Interpersonal Skills person
- Strong verbal and written communication skills in English
- Ability to travel within where SOS projects existed sporadically

* Successful candidate we will provide as below:
- High competitive salary
- Child allowance
- Health care allowance
- Pension Funds in year 2nd
- Housing allowance in year 2nd

* Application Information
- Interested candidates please submit CV and Cover Letter and Salary expected to below address:
- Address: National Office: #44Bis, Street 334, Sangkat Boeung Keng Kang I, Khan Chamkar Mon,Phnom Penh
- Contact: HR-Department
- Mrs. Them Sokheng
- Senior HR
- Phone: 023 219190 / 012986466
- Email: info@soscvcambodia.org
- Website: www.sos-childrensvillages.org

* Closed Date : 27 December 2021
Company Profile:
SOS Children’s Villages Cambodia is the national chapter of SOS Children Villages which is an independent non-
governmental organization currently operational in 136 countries worldwide including 14 countries in Asia Region.
At SOS we are committed to the child care and protection through various alternate care and family strengthening
programs to strengthen families and communities as a preventive measure in the fight against abandonment and
social neglect of children without parental care or children at the risk of losing parental care. We build families for
children in need; we help them shape their own future; and we share in the development of their communities
regardless of their ethnic roots, nationality and religion for an independent life. SOS Children’s Villages has strong
Child Protection Policy and everyone in the organization is responsible to adhere to this Policy. SOS Children's
Villages Cambodia is currently seeking the qualified and competitive dynamic candidates to fill the following
positions as below.

Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

job title: Manager, ATM Network & Digital Branch Support Office
position: Manager, ATM Network & Digital Branch Support Office
Job Description: Manages monitoring on remaining cash balances and other issues of each ATM and ensures reports to related parties.Negotiates, reviews, and manages ATM location leasing agreement in order to suggest related parties for renewal, new location on time (in case there is any changes), or relocation. This also includes sourcing of new ATM locations.Proper plans and schedules for regular staff visits to ATM locations including ATM locations at branches to collect information on their status, security, hygiene or sanitation, ventilation system, decoration, logo and decals, lightings and illumination. Reviews visit reports and suggest related parties for improvement and or re-enforcement.Produces ATM network performance reports and statistics and recommends for improvement where is necessary.Manages provision of support, troubleshooting, and maintenance of applications and hardware.Schedules and provides appropriate training staff at branches and related stakeholders on processes of all digital applications.Help branches and other entities to identify and carry out feasibility study on requirements for digital systems/applications.Collaborate with concerned entities in related application development, procurement of related equipment and devices, and roll out to branches.Work with related stakeholders in conceptual designs and visualization of digital branch, and installation of digital systems at branches.Digital application performance monitoring and statistics and report production.Other tasks assigned by the management.
Job Requirement: Bachelor degree or higher in IT related fields.Good communication in English and Khmer.At least 3-year in provision of support or management of ATM/Kiosk network/services.Good knowledge on digital applications, development management, and innovation in relation with banking product/services.Strong interpersonal skills, good teamwork, and able to work under pressing conditions.Practical knowledge in managing project activities, action plans, and good understanding of technical process, designs, drawings, etc.Ability to plan, organize, analyze, and resolve problems.
Company Profile:
FTB is Cambodia's first and foremost bank. It is a private commercial bank and has been providing customers with safe and reliable banking services for 40 years. 

The Bank was created following Sub-decree No. 1213 dated 10 October 1979 under the former regime of the State of Cambodia. In 2000, the Bank was          separated from the direct management of the National Bank of Cambodia ("the Central Bank") in order to transform its permanent identity into a state-owned commercial bank in Cambodia with the features of a Public Economic Enterprise and with the intention of conducting autonomous business              operations. 

In January 2001, the Bank obtained its banking license from the Central Bank to operate as a commercial bank in the Kingdom of Cambodia for a period of      three years starting from 4 January 2001. This was the first license granted to enable the Bank to operate as a separate legal entity independent from the Central Bank's direct management. On 8 January 2004, the Bank obtained its 2nd banking license from the Central Bank for a period of three years starting    from that date. The Bank now holds a commercial banking license, which was renewed for an indefinite period, on 21 December 2006

On 31 December 2002, the Ministry of Economy and Finance ("MEF") announced, through a Statement of Intent, the privatisation of the Bank as part of the   reform of the financial sector of the Royal Government of Cambodia. On 28 October 2005 the shareholders of the Bank, represented by the Privatisation   Committee, entered into a sales agreement with Canadia Bank and ING Holding Company. The Central Bank sold its 20% shareholding in the Bank and MEF   reduced its 80% shareholding to 10%. In 2009, in accordance with the recommendation of the Central Bank, Canadia Bank reduced its shares from 48% to  15.22% and 2 new private shareholders having respectively a share of 15.39%, entered the capital of FTB. The Bank's Memorandum and Articles of

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project
- Negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements
- Obtaining permits and licenses from appropriate authorities
- Determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations
- Plan all construction operations and schedule intermediate phases to ensure deadlines will be met
- Acquire equipment and material and monitor stocks to timely handle inadequacies
- Hire contractors and other staff and allocate responsibilities
- Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics etc. and give them guidance when needed
- Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports
- Ensure adherence to all health and safety standards and report issues
Job Requirement:
- Master/Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management
- At least 6 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations
- Proven experience as construction project manager
- In-depth understanding of construction procedures and material and project management principles
- Familiarity with quality and health and safety standards
- Good knowledge of MS Office
- Familiarity with construction/ project management software
- Outstanding communication and negotiation skills
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- A team player with leadership abilities

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
- Coordinating and supervising construction workers
- Selecting tools and materials
- Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk
Job Requirement:
- Graduated in Civil Engineering
- At least 5 years’ experiences in related field
- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
8.ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ 
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
• Study in major Law, IR or Administration  ( BA )
• Good in English speaking writing reading 
• Over 1 to 3 years of work experience
• Fluent in English or Chinese language
• MS Office & Email
• Have knowledge on customer service or admin. 
• Strong skills in customer service and report

•	Update new law & regulations as per announcement from Ministry of Land Management for implementation on time.
•	Ensure corporate operations in compliance with local law and regulations

•	Oversees employee schedules to ensure coverage of front desk and attorney’s needs.

•	Provides supervisory oversight for the administrative support team for the Legal Services function.
•	Assists with providing performance evaluation feedback

•	Bachelor Degree or Master degree of Law
•	At least 2 or 3 years in Legal 
•	Strong team working skills
•	Active and willing to learn
•	Good communication
•	Willing to work under pressure

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
8.ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ 
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
• Study in major Law, IR or Administration  ( BA )
• Good in English speaking writing reading 
• Over 1 to 3 years of work experience
• Fluent in English
• MS Office & Email
• Have knowledge on customer service or admin. 
• Strong skills in customer service and report

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

job title: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
position: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project
- Negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements
- Obtaining permits and licenses from appropriate authorities
- Determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations
- Plan all construction operations and schedule intermediate phases to ensure deadlines will be met
- Acquire equipment and material and monitor stocks to timely handle inadequacies
- Hire contractors and other staff and allocate responsibilities
- Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics etc. and give them guidance when needed
- Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports
- Ensure adherence to all health and safety standards and report issues
Job Requirement:
- Master/Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management
- At least 6 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations
- Proven experience as construction project manager
- In-depth understanding of construction procedures and material and project management principles
- Familiarity with quality and health and safety standards
- Good knowledge of MS Office
- Familiarity with construction/ project management software
- Outstanding communication and negotiation skills
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- A team player with leadership abilities

Job Description:
- Leadership and management role
- Ensure smooth operations at all time
- Be able to manage campus and assist HR & Admin task in term of recruitment and discipline as well as office management
- Good at Finance & Accounting in term of preparing payroll and control petty cash
- Understand all operations such as: customer service and Academics.
- Ensure smooth school operation
- Create and check all documents
- Record School history
- Set and manage the working schedule
- Have good communication with all relevant ministries, and student’s parents as well as guardians
- Other related tasks assigned by Deputy General Director
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor or Master degree in Business/ Education Management or related field
- Experience of team management
- Minimum 3 years experiences in school operations
- In-depth knowledge of the Cambodia educational system
- Strong leadership and management
- Sales & Marketing exposure is beneficial
- Accounting Knowledge is an advantage
- Good interpersonal skill and problem solving
- Positive attitude, Honest & friendly
- Computer Literacy of Microsoft Office
Company Profile: ELT Education Co., Ltd is the first company to obtain a License to conduct School Business from the Ministry Of Commerce since May 18, 2016. The Company's former name was American Academic of Language Art (AALA) was founded in 1994 in Phnom Penh Cambodia. It was set up by an entrepreneur from the United States, who believed that education would enrich the people‘s understanding and abilities to help develop the country.

Job Description:
- Income and Expense: Ensure all expense and income report by campuses to be done on time 
- Tax: Ensure declare tax on salary, income and expense on time and not fine from government
- NSSF: Prepare any documents for NSSF and pay every months 
- Work permit: Process and update any documents for foreigner teachers and pay every years 
- Visa Extension: Process any documents for foreigner teachers
- Finance: Compile and present reports, budgets, commentaries and financial statements. Financial forecasting and risk analysis. Prepare balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other reports.
- Asset: Prepares asset, liability, and capital account entries by compiling and analyzing account information
- Audit: Do internal and external audit
- Government: Ensure legal compliance by monitoring and implementing applicable labor law requirements by government, conducting investigations, maintaining records, representing the organization at hearings
- Document Management: Prepare, manage & Archive all documents both hard & soft. Maintain historical human resource records by designing a filing and retrieval system, keeping past and current records. Develop all procedures which are relevant to Accounting Management 
- Confidential: Responsible for a secure and confidential staff and teachers’ salary services including paycheck, deposit and other fees. Secures financial information and other confidential data
- Payroll: Ensure all staff and teachers received their paycheck on time and correct (twice per month)
- Teamwork & motivation: promote positivity, teamwork, challenging working environment, engagement, involvement, team spirit, and growth for all teachers, students and academic team
- Other Tasks as assigned
Job Requirement:
- Have degree in BA or MA in related field 
- Work experience at least 4 years
- Commit with the job
- Can use English as communication

Job Description:
A. A – Z BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT OPERATION
B. COMMUNICATION SERVICES: School Phone, Email, website, Facebook page, etc.  
C. PLAN & EXECUTION: Implement profitable business plan and strategies 
D. LEADERSHIP ROLE: Act as Leader, Inspector, HR & Administer, Supervisor

E.RESPONSIBILITIES AND DUTIES:
a. Sales: Generate Sales and meet targets 
b. Sales & Marketing Strategy: Prepare effective sales & marketing strategy that adhere to budgets
c. Recruitment & Training: Help recruit and train sales & marketing teams to the excellence 
d. PR: Develop strong Public Relation & Networking with B2B, other school and community, etc. 
e. Brand Awareness: Create consistent powerful branding awareness and objectives 
f. Solutions & Product Expansion: Expand product lines and services with better solutions 
g. Business Development & Expansion: Responsible for business analysis, expansion and development 
h. Events: Organize school events and other marketing related activities to generate sales
i. Meeting: Organize & facilitate meetings, conferences, and other special events (notation, agenda, room set up including desks, chairs, slide, projector, water, snacks, and clean up after meeting)
j. Advertising: Design print ads and publication, Oversee creation and delivery of press releases, advertisements, and other marketing materials. 
k. Social Media: Create a strong Social Media to boost consumer’s engagement & sales via Facebook, Instagram, YouTube, etc.
l. Promotion: Propose effective promotion strategies & tools to boost up the enrollment & sales 
m. Customer Survey & feedback: Gather and analyze customer feedback internal & external
n. SWOT Analysis: Conduct SWOT Analysis as needed to ensure the growth of the market share and stay competitive in the business arena

F. Reports: 
1. Competitor analysis including price, product and strategy (termly, semester, yearly)
2. Students enrollment and dropped out (daily, weekly, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
3. suggestion box and survey (daily, weekly, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
4. Daily operation services (daily, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
5. Customer daily visit report (daily, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Economics / Business Administration
- At least 4 years or Business Development in sales experience (knowledge of school operation)
- Must be outgoing and easily able to build relationships at all levels of corporate clients
- great command usage of English for communication 
- Strong customer facing, achievement driven, team work
- Equip with developed communication, persuasiveness, and negotiation skills
- Self-Motivated and performance driven

Job Description:
OBJECTIVES		:
To ensure a profitable business & academic operations, generate student number and meet sale targets with quality education, excellent services, effectiveness and efficiency of the responsibilities listed below:

A. COMMUNICATION SERVICES: School Phone, Email, website, Facebook page, etc.  
B. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 
a. Customer Services: Identify problems with solutions, greeting & general services, communication & relation
b. Lost and Found Service: keep record,  manage lost and found items 
c. Admission & Enrollment: Enrollment, registration, school management system, payments, student interview & Placement, application & documents, student ID & Parent pick up card, etc. 
d. Sale: set and meet sale targets
e. Customer Relation Management: Keep record of customer visit & enrollment, follow up & feedback
f. PR & Marketing: Public Relation, events, competitions, media, social media, SWOT analysis, business survey & expansion. Prepare & deliver other school flyers and other related activities
g. Media:  Encourage all photos and videos are liked, shared, commented by students and team members.
h. Parents: Identify problems with solutions, counseling service, communication, relationship, general services, community, support, etc. 
i. Stock: Manage the stock and inventory including books, uniforms, photocopy
j. Call Centre: Communicate courteously with customers via telephone, email, letter and face to face
k. International Study Centre: Promote international study service, generate sales & offer student support, prepare all related documents 
l. Events & Meeting: Organize and facilitate meetings, conferences, and other special events including notation, agenda, room set up including desks, chairs, slide, projector, water, snacks, and clean up after meeting
m. Other service: Promote Food Court, Noon care, Transportation services to customers
Job Requirement:
C. OTHER DUTIES
a. Respect and act according to school’s vision, mission, goals, all management system, policies and guidelines.
b. Conduct, attend all meeting & training required by the organization
c. Cooperate well with other departments and Campuses.  
d. Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports to the immediate manager
e. Perform other duties as required.

D. REPORT
a. Customer visit record  via phone call, FB page, and walk in (daily, weekly, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
b. Customer feedback via phone call, FB page, and walk in (daily, weekly, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
c. Student number of enrollment, dropped and transferred (Weekly, monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
d. School events, academic activities, and other related activities (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
e. Stock & inventory reports including books, uniforms, & other materials (termly, semester, yearly)
f. Paper management (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
g. Student information analysis including suggestion box and survey (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)

Job Description:
Objective: To deliver excellent quality of learning and teaching to meet the school standard of quality.

A. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES: 
a. Follow academic workflow
b. Teacher Attitude & Professionalism: Teacher must be well prepared with excellent discipline, punctual, approachable, respectful, responsible, reliable, and cooperative & have good sense of humors etc. 
c. Teacher Observation: Be cooperative with open-minded and be willing to improve
d. Grooming: Wear School Uniform if any, ID Card, look professional, and obey the school grooming policy at all-time within the school premises
e. Teaching & Learning: Ensure quality of learning & teaching with up to date methodology & technology
f. Lesson Plan: Prepare and follow lesson plan 
g. Extra learning  activities: Plan a program that helps each student achieve learning objectives & curriculum goal
h. Test: Prepare, correct, update all tests, quizzes, both soft and hard
i. Homework & Handout: Provide enough homework and handout for students 
j. Learning materials & Resources: Prepare for all classes as needed, be innovative & creative
k. Professional Development: All teachers must commit to continually improve their teaching methodology skills and knowledge
l. Student: Discipline, learning outcome, score, homework, attendance, attitude, communication, counseling, grooming, participation, engagement, competitions, observation & evaluation, etc.
m. Student Evaluation: Evaluate students’ performance and progress to enhance their skills and attitude on regular basis
n. Student Feedback: Cooperate and be open-minded for student feedback if applicable (once per term/semester)
o. Parents: Identify problems with solutions, counseling service, communication, relationship, general services & support, etc. 
p. School Events & PTM: Propose, prepare, and participate in all school events including parent-teacher meeting
q. Curriculum: Follow the school curriculum, course outline and syllabus
r. English Learning Environment: All students must communicate in English at all-time except during their Khmer or Chinese learning time
s. Classroom Management: well-disciplined, fun and effective learning environment
t. Class Decoration: Proper, beautiful, clean, suitable for program and age group
u. Greeting Services: all teachers are required to welcome students and parents before and after school
v. Safety: All students must be supervised and monitored at all time
w. Media:  Like, share and comment all photos and videos on school Facebook pages, Youtube,, and Instagram. Encourage students and other colleagues to do so
x. Communication:  be active and responsive professionally via Telegram and phone call
y. Computer Update & Maintenance: Install programs, update & ensure all computers are in well maintenance
Job Requirement:
B. OTHER DUTIES
a. Respect and act according to school’s vision, mission, goals, all management system, policies and guidelines.
b. Conduct, attend all meeting & training required by the organization
c. Cooperate well with other departments and Campuses.  
d. Prepare daily, weekly, and monthly reports to the immediate manager
e. Perform other duties as required.

C. REPORT
a. Students’ progress report and record books (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
b. Students’ discipline and attitude  (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
c. Students’ attendance (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
d. Computers and software maintenance (monthly, termly, semester, yearly)
Company Profile: ELT Education Co., Ltd is the first company to obtain a License to conduct School Business from the Ministry Of Commerce since May 18, 2016. The Company's former name was American Academic of Language Art (AALA) was founded in 1994 in Phnom Penh Cambodia. It was set up by an entrepreneur from the United States, who believed that education would enrich the people‘s understanding and abilities to help develop the country.

job title: ប្រតិបត្តិករកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព
company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
position: ប្រតិបត្តិករកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព
Job Description:
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យ សង្កេតទៅលើសកម្មភាពនៅតាមកាមេរ៉ាសុវត្ថិភាព។
• មើលពីសកម្មភាពចោរកម្មជុំវិញបរិវេណសាលា។
• មើលសកម្មភាពការងារបុគ្គលិកទូទៅ។
• មើលសកម្មភាពសិស្សរៀន និងពេលប្រឡង។
• មើលសកម្មភាពគ្រូបង្រៀន។
• មើលការចេញចូល និងស្នាក់នៅសាលានៅពេលយប់។
• មើលទ្រព្យសម្បត្តិរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន។
• ចុះត្រួតពិនិត្យកាមេរ៉ាតាមសាខា។
• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ។
• រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍សម្រាប់ផ្ញើអ៊ីម៉ែលប្រចាំខែ។
• រៀបចំឯកសារតាមប្រធានផ្នែកស្នើសុំ។
Job Requirement:
•	ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ ឬសញ្ញាបត្រមានតម្លៃស្មើ
•	ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស សរសេរ ស្តាប់ អាន បានល្អ។
•	ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កម្មវិធីកុំព្យូទ័របាន (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…)
•	អាចវាយអត្ថបទ រៀបចំឯកសារបាន។

សូមភ្ជាប់មកជាមួយនូវ ប្រវត្តិរូបសង្ខេប (CV) និងរូបថតបច្ចុប្បន្នភាព 4x6។
បេក្ខជន បេក្ខនារីទាំងអស់អាចមកដាក់ពាក្យសុំធ្វើការនៅអគារលេខ223 និង227, មហាវិថីម៉ៅសេទុង ឬតាមរយៈអ៊ីមែល: hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh, Website: www.mjqeducation.edu.kh, www.mjqjobs.com, Mengly J. Quach Education PLC, MJQ Jobs, Tel: (855) 12 797 939, (855) 61 700 181
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
-	Controlling project from start to finish to ensure high quality, innovative and functional design
-       Detail layout for Draftsman to make sure Site Engineer easy understand
-	Taking the “brief” to identify clients’ needs and put together feasibility reports and design proposals
-	 Visiting site to check on project status and report on project.
-	Meeting with clients to determine objectives and requirements for structure.
-	Estimating the amount of required materials, equipment, and construction time
-	Directing workers who prepare drawings and document
-	Visiting sites to ensure that construction adheres to architectural plans
-	Specifying the materials needed for construction of projects
-	Working with contractors, surveyors, and engineers to create a construction schedule and bring the designs to fruition
-	Resolving issues that come up during construction
-	Participating in project management throughout the construction
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Architect and Engineering or other related fields
- 2 years of work experience with construction 
- Can use SketchUp, Layout, Photoshop
- Good in both English and Khmer
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, and problem solving skills
- Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
