Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
- Coordinating and supervising construction workers
- Selecting tools and materials
- Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk

- Graduated in Civil Engineering

- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
8.ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ 
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
• Study in major Law, IR or Administration  ( BA )
• Good in English speaking writing reading 
• Over 1 to 3 years of work experience
• Fluent in English
• MS Office & Email
• Have knowledge on customer service or admin. 
• Strong skills in customer service and report

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

job title: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
position: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge

5. Employee Handling

o take action in their individual development and welfare

o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company

o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures.

o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required

o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting

o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project

Job Description:
-Prepares and implements the training budget.
-Develops Training Needs Assessment of company and plan the training program accordingly.
-Sets behavioral training objectives and develops training and development plan.
-Travels to branches to identify and analyze the training and development gaps and propose the training courses and activities to business team.
-Develops, implements, and monitors training program within LOLC.
-Builds and establishes professional relationship with the institutions/people you think will have direct or indirect influence on the implementation of Staff Training and Development Plan. 
-Supervises development of curriculum/syllabus and the needed materials/references.
-Supervise training course arrangement support, course development, course delivery, course evaluation, process measurement, and training cost management.
-Develops in-house capability of training staff and resource persons.
-Ensures that all training conducted with quality and properly documented.
-Coordinates selection of participants to foreign and in-country training programs.
-Initiates conduct of post-training impact evaluation to determine training effectiveness on the job.
-Develops and implement training follow up after in-house training. 
-Provides support to department head in responding to training issue. 
-Coordinate efforts to ensure that full utilization of training facilities, processes, resource person and equipment. 
-Perform other tasks which assigned by Head of HR.
Job Requirement:
- BA/MBA in Education, Finance and Banking or HRM or equivalence.
- 05-year working experiences in training and development and coaching skills.
- Experiences in business identification and analysis and can propose the training courses. 
- Experience or knowledge of microfinance and the banking industry is preferable.
- Self-motivation person with excellent interpersonal and selling skills.
- Good English and computer skills.
- Good relationship with the public, ability to work under pressure and work independently.

position: ​បុគ្គលិកបញ្ជរចល័ត​ (Mobile Counter Staff)
Job Description:
- បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យប្លង់ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ, កែតម្រូវព័ត៌មាន ឬទិន្នន័យប្លង់របស់អតិថិជនក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ, ធ្វើការកែតម្រូវ ព័ត៌មានលេខសម្គាល់អតិថិជន, បើកលេខគណនីទូទាត់របស់អតិថិជន, បើកប្រាក់កម្ចី និងកែតម្រូវ គ្រប់ ផលិតផល។
- ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងអនុវត្តការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃ ព័ត៌មាន (CBC, បើកលេខសម្គាល់អតិថិជន, ការងារជំនួយលើផ្នែក ឥណទាន, បណ្តុះវិន័យឥណទានមុនពេលទម្លាក់ទុន។)
- បញ្ចូលទិន្នន័យ (PPI, Collateral, Adjustment និងត្រួតពិនិត្យ Unauthorized List, Vintage Report, Loan, Saving, Fixed Deposit) ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធT24។
-ត្រួតពិនិត្យ និងបោះពុម្ពរបាយការណ៍គណនីអតិថិជន (Statement of Account, Summary Account, តារាងសងប្រាក់,​តារាងតម្លាភាពរបស់អតិថិជន, បង្កាន់ដៃតម្កល់លើទ្រព្យដាក់ហ៊ីប៉ូតែក, OR Listing), ប្រមូលប្រាក់, របាយការណ៍ CBC, របាយការណ៍តាមដានកម្ចីយឺតយ៉ាវ និងរបាយការណ៍ផ្សេងៗ។
- ពិនិត្យផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ឡើងវិញនូវឯកសារកម្ចី, ការបង់ផ្តាច់, ដាក់ និងដកទ្រព្យហ៊ីប៉ូតែក, បើកលេខសំគាល់ អតិថិជន, បើកលេខគណនីទូទាត់របស់អតិថិជន, upload signature, update customer information ក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ។
- ជួយ​រៀបចំឯកសារកម្ចីទិញរថយន្ត ផ្ញើជូននាយកដ្ឋានឥណទានតាមការណែនាំរបស់ថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
- ទទួលប្រាក់ពីមន្រ្តីឥណទាន។
- រៀបចំផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់សាច់ប្រាក់ជាក់ស្តែង ជាមួយឯកសារ និងក្នុងប្រព័ន្ធ រួចប្រគល់ជូនបេឡាធិការ។
- ដាក់ និងដកប្រាក់បញ្ញើជូនអតិថិជន, Transfer, fast transaction and local money transfer ។
- Closed SA, FD, Reverse signature, Reactivate inactive account, Freeze account, Block account
- អនុវត្តការងារផ្សេងៗដែលចាត់ចែងដោយថ្នាក់គ្រប់គ្រង។
Job Requirement:
* សមត្ថភាពដែលតម្រូវឱ្យមាន៖
- បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកគណនេយ្យ ឬ ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ
- យ៉ាងហោចណាស់មានបទពិសោធន៍ការងារ២ឆ្នាំ និងបទពិសោធន៍នៅក្នុងវិស័យមីក្រូហិរញ្ញវត្ថុកាន់តែប្រសើរ
- ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេសអាចប្រើប្រាស់បាន
- ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជាកម្មវិធី Ms. Office, Internet, Email, etc….
- មានភាពម៉ត់ចត់នឹងការងារ និង មានជំនាញក្នុងការត្រួតពិនិត្យនិងវាយតម្លៃ
- មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និង ឧស្សាហ៍ព្យាយាម
- អាចធ្វើការដោយឯករាជ្យបាន
- អាចធ្វើដំណើរជាញឹកញាប់ និងចល័តទៅបំពេញការងារនៅទីតាំងផ្សេងមិនមែនជាទីតាំងប្រចាំការរបស់ខ្លួន។

* របៀបដាក់ពាក្យ៖
សូមដាក់ពាក្យសុំបម្រើការងារ (CV & Cover Letter​) ជាមួយរូបថតថ្មី(4x6)

company_name: ក្រុមហ៊ុន ម៉េងលី ជេ. គួច អេឌ្យូខេសិន (Mengly J. Quach Education)
Job Description:
. Ensure daily operational of all IB stores run smoothly both internal and external 
. Ensure CSR is properly monitor
. Control all IB revenue, Discount, Sale return 
. Improve customer services
. Create and update procedure for operations 
. Coordinate with staffs and other departments
. Monitor and control stock managements of all IB store
. Staff managements
. Create good environment for teamwork
. Randomly spot check and do round 
. Cash float control of all stores
. Review on pricing
. Create operation flow and training before implement (new product, services, promotion etc)
. Make sure information has been proper sharing to all relevant staffs
. Make clear instruction, Tasks, deadline to staffs
. Direct Intercon Bookstore staff in the performance of all day-to-day operation by provide all staff with daily task list
. Check and review daily sale and sale return report 
. Check and review monthly sale and sale return report
. Conduct monthly stock count
. Prepare administrative and operational reports as requires
. Solve issue with other departments
. Perform other related duties required by line manager.
Job Requirement:
. Master/Bachelor’ s degree in business management or any closely related fields
. At least 3+ years’ working experience project management
. Result and customer-service oriented
. Committed and responsible team player
. Excellent interpersonal skills essential
. Good organizational skills and ability to work well with other department
. Must have knowledge of retail operating principles, cashiering, budgeting, management principle, inventory and accounting
. Ability to work with a diverse group of people and have strong multi-tasking skills, excellent oral communication skills and the ability to perform consistently, even under pressure
. Ability to supervise and train employees, to include organizing, prioritizing, and scheduling work assignments
. Employee development and performance management skills
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

Job Description:
- Prepare documents/guidelines to related tasks.
- Day to day operational tasks such as proactive maintenance, monitoring performance, incident and problem management, backup & recovery across the network configuration.
- Assign user passwords and privilege and maintain data integrity.
- Learn and understand System Administration functionality.
- Work as team to support user and report to supervisor.
- Has self-development by research, training internal and external.
- Bright/Innovation idea for self/team improvement is additional benefit.
- Fully support, configure, maintain and upgrade corporate customer’s networks and in house servers.
- Install and integrate new server hardware and applications.
- Support and administer third-party applications.
- First line support for hardware/ software problems. Monitor problems and report the issue to Local Services Partners or vendors.
- Ensure network security and connectivity.
- Resolve problems reported by end user.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related fields.
- Preferably with a minimum of 1 years MFIs/banking or related fields.
- Hands on experience in networking, routing and switching.
- Knowledge of best practices around management, control, and monitoring of server infrastructure.
- Experience with firewalls, Internet VPN’s remote implementation, troubleshooting, and problem resolution is desired.
- Good communication skills.
- Good in written and oral English.
- Ability to work under pressure.

How to Apply For:

Please submit your Cover Letter, CV and relevant documents to any branches nearby your locations or head office of LOLC (Cambodia) Plc. or via email: recruitment@lolc.com.kh

Job Description:
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការចេញវិក័យប័ត្រ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗទៅកាន់អតិថិជន 
- រៀបចំកត់ត្រា និងពិនិត្យលើរបាយការណ៍ហិរញ្ញវត្ថុ វិក័យប័ត្រចំណូល ចំណាយ និងឯកសារផ្សេងៗដែលពាក់ពាន់
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើការទិញសម្ភារៈផ្សេងៗ ពីផ្នែកដែលជាប់ពាក់ពាន់
- ទទួលខុសត្រូវ លើការបង់ប្រាក់ ការទាមទារទឹកប្រាក់នៅសល់ ពីអតិថិជន
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ និងផ្តល់ជូនទៅអោយប្រធានផ្នែកពិនិត្យ ជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃ រឺសប្តាហ៍
- ការងារបន្ទាប់បន្សំ និងត្រូវផ្តល់ដោយប្រធានផ្នែក រឺអ្នកដែលជាប់ពាក់ពាន់
Job Requirement:
- កំរិតសិក្សាថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាប័ត្រ រឺសញ្ញាប័ត្រដែលជាប់ពាក់ពាន់
- អាចប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័របាន (កម្មវិធីផ្នែករដ្ឋបាល  អ៊ីនធឺណេត  អ៊ីម៉ែល ។ល។)
- មានភាពឆ្លាតវៃ ស្មោះត្រង់ និងរហ័សរហួនក្នុងពេលបំពេញការងារ
- មានភាពប៉ិនប្រសប់ធ្វើការជាក្រុម និងមានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់លើការងារ

សំគាល់ៈ

Job Description:
- Take off quantity of MEP both Infra & Building.
- Preparation of Tender documents, front end documents and queries
- Preparation of tender brief, read and understand the tender drawing and relevant specification.
- Bid comparison of subcontractor offers, collect cost data analyzing.
- Update and developing of price database for tender as per the subcontractor/supplier quotations.
- Checking MEP drawing, BOQ and Planning (Schedule)
- Prepare the contract or Letter of Agreement (LOA).
- Preparation of Interim Payment Certificate (IPC), Variation Order (VO) for all MEP work
- Can go to site and checking technical work at site.
- Analyzing cost between Actual cost and budget cost
- Report to Manager in charge
Job Requirement: - Bachelor's Degree in Electrical or Mechanical Engineering or related field- Minimum 3 years of experience in building construction- Understanding of MEP Building Construction - Knowledge of Cambodian building code- Good commend of written and spoken English- Ability to read drawing and specification
Company Profile: Since its founding in 1982, Chip Mong has focused extensively on the changing needs of the society and the strengthening of its relationships with business communities, both domestically and internationally. In recent years, Chip Mong has experienced tremendous growth and evolved into one of the largest groups of companies in the country, comprising seven wholly-owned subsidies, three joint-ventures, and two hotel projects. Chip Mong’s businesses include construction and materials, consumers goods, property development, beverages, general industrials, hospitality, retail and feed. The Company also offers a vast array of consumer products from well-known manufacturers throughout the region.

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project
- Negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements
- Obtaining permits and licenses from appropriate authorities
- Determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations
- Plan all construction operations and schedule intermediate phases to ensure deadlines will be met
- Acquire equipment and material and monitor stocks to timely handle inadequacies
- Hire contractors and other staff and allocate responsibilities
- Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics etc. and give them guidance when needed
- Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports
- Ensure adherence to all health and safety standards and report issues
Job Requirement:
- Master/Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management
- At least 6 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations
- Proven experience as construction project manager
- In-depth understanding of construction procedures and material and project management principles
- Familiarity with quality and health and safety standards
- Good knowledge of MS Office
- Familiarity with construction/ project management software
- Outstanding communication and negotiation skills
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- A team player with leadership abilities

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
- Coordinating and supervising construction workers
- Selecting tools and materials
- Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk

- Graduated in Civil Engineering

- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

job title: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
position: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project
- Negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements
- Obtaining permits and licenses from appropriate authorities
- Determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations
- Plan all construction operations and schedule intermediate phases to ensure deadlines will be met
- Acquire equipment and material and monitor stocks to timely handle inadequacies
- Hire contractors and other staff and allocate responsibilities
- Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics etc. and give them guidance when needed
- Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports
- Ensure adherence to all health and safety standards and report issues
Job Requirement:
- Master/Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management
- At least 6 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations
- Proven experience as construction project manager
- In-depth understanding of construction procedures and material and project management principles
- Familiarity with quality and health and safety standards
- Good knowledge of MS Office
- Familiarity with construction/ project management software
- Outstanding communication and negotiation skills
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- A team player with leadership abilities

Company Profile:
Wing Bank (Cambodia) Plc – the bank for every Cambodian – is driven by the vision to provide every Cambodian with convenient access to financial services relevant to, and for the improvement of their daily lives.

Wing Bank has revolutionized the way Cambodians access financial services by introducing instant, secure, and convenient Mobile Financial Services since 18 August 2008.

Today, Wing Bank serves the entire Cambodian population with 100% coverage of the districts in Cambodia thanks to the innovative Wing Bank App, over 10,000 Wing Cash Xpress agents, over 55,000 merchants, and partnerships with industry giants such as Mastercard, MoneyGram, AliPay, WeChat Pay, Western Union, Visa, and Ria.

Wing Bank provides an array of advanced financial products both for individual and corporate customers. These include loans, deposits, micro savings, credit referral services, money transfers, utility and insurance payments, supply chain payments, payroll services and even phone top-ups. In addition, Wing offers retail payments via “WingPay”, and has also introduced the “WingMall” e-commerce platform.

Both small and large companies alike are now using Wing’s payroll and disbursement services, speeding up their payments. Over 80% of Wing’s agents and 50% of customers are women, making Wing a shining example of gender inclusion in the region.

Wing Bank is committed to providing financial, gender and digital inclusion to the unbanked and the under-banked, allowing every Cambodian to enjoy convenience and security when it comes to financial services

Job Description:
Job Objectives: If you’re passionate about mobile platforms and translating code into user-friendly apps, we would like to meet and give you the opportunity to join our team to develop and maintain high-quality mobile applications.
- Develop and distribute mobile apps for Android platform
- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
- Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
- Translate business requirements into specifications that will be used to implement the required application
- Write clean and maintainable codes according to best practices
- Deliver across the entire app life cycle concept, design, build, deploy, test, release to app stores and support
- Working with the front-end developers to build the interface with focus on usability features
- Standardizing the platform and in some cases apps to deliver across multiple brands with minimal duplication of effort
- Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies
- Translate designs and application wireframes into quality code
- Work with product development team to analyze, design & plan on new application features
- Develop backend app, microservice and others API as required
- Unit-test code for robustness, usability, and general reliability
- Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize application efficiency and performance
- Other Tasks Assigned by Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in computer science or equivalent
- 2+ years experience in Android development (Java/ Kotlin, OOP)
- Understanding of Android’s design principles and interface guidelines
- Experience with delivering mobile apps to both AppStore and Google Play Store
- Experience working with REST and JSON
- Experience with MVP, MVVM, or Clean architecture
- Experience with third-party libraries and APIs
- Experience with UnitTesting (Android UnitTest), MockTest 
- Experience with Application Profiling (Memory Management, Network Management)
- Experience with Git
- Working knowledge of the general mobile landscape, architectures, trends, and emerging technologies
- Programming/scripting experience and knowledge of mobile development life cycle
- Experience working with a development team
- Autonomous and proactive, quick learner, and effective communication
- Experience with  RESTful or SOAP APIs
- Experience with API/Backend App Development
- Experience with Spring framework and RDBMS
- Experience working with UI/UX design
- Experience publishing a high-quality Android application to the Google Play Store
- Familiarity with cloud message APIs and push notifications
- Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
- Have a logical, analytical and creative approach to problems
- Proficient understanding of code versioning tools

Job Description:
- Establish the needs of users and monitor user access and security
- Monitor performance and manage parameters to provide fast responses to front-end users
- Map out the conceptual design for a planned database
- Consider both back-end organization of data and front-end accessibility for end-users
- Refine the logical design so that it can be translated into a specific data model
- Further refining the physical design to meet system storage requirements
- Install and test new versions of the database management system (DBMS)
- Maintain data standards, including adherence to the Data Protection Act
- Write database documentation, including data standards, procedures and definitions for the data dictionary (metadata)
- Control access permissions and privileges
- Develop, manage and test back-up and recovery plans
- Ensure that storage and archiving procedures are functioning correctly
- Carry out capacity planning
- Communicate regularly with technical, applications and operational staff to ensure database integrity and security
- Commission and install new applications and customize existing applications to make them fit for purpose
- Apply Oracle Patches
- Manage the security and disaster recovery aspects of a database
- Install and configure WebLogic domains and performance monitoring
- Install WebLogic patches, service packs, etc.

*  IT MIS Department
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in Computer science
- Holding Oracle Certified Associate (OCA) or Oracle Certified Professional (OCP) is plus
- Experience with Oracle, MS SQL, MySQL, PostgreSQL database administration
- Experience in troubleshooting and resolving database or server problem
- Knowledge in database performance tuning and optimization
- Knowledge of (HA) High Availability and (DR) Disaster Recovery.
- Knowledge of Linux OS, Solaris and variety of storage products is plus
- Experience with database backup, restore, recovery and security
- Knowledge of Oracle WebLogic, Fusion Middleware is plus
- Good communication, commitment, teamwork and documentation skills.
- Good problem solver, focused and dedicated developer with ability to work on your own as well as with a team
- Able to work shift time

- Meticulous attention to detail with the superb organizational skills.
- Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
- Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
- Excellent communication and IT skills.

Job Description:

- Ensure the performance, quality, and responsiveness of applications
- Work on bug fixing and improving application performance
- Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features
- Translate business requirements into specifications that will be used to implement the required application

- Working with the front-end developers to build the interface with focus on usability features
- Standardizing the platform and in some cases apps to deliver across multiple brands with minimal duplication of effort
- Keep up to date on the latest industry trends in the mobile technologies

- Experience working with REST and JSON

- Programming/scripting experience and knowledge of mobile development life cycle

- Autonomous and proactive, quick learner, and effective communication
- Bachelor degree in computer science or equivalent
- 2+ years experience in iOS (Objective-C, Swift, UIKit, Cocoa, RxSwift, RxCocoa, Threading, Animation, OOP) development

Job Description:
•Developing and implementing purchasing strategies.
•Managing daily purchasing activities, supervising staff, and allocating tasks.
•Managing supplier relations and negotiating contracts, prices, timelines, etc.
•Maintaining the supplier database, purchase records, and related documentation.
•Coordinating with inventory control to determine and manage inventory needs.
•Managing the maintenance of office/manufacturing equipment and machinery.
•Ensuring that all procured items meet the required quality standards and specifications.
•Preparing cost estimates and managing budgets.
•Working to improve purchasing systems and processes.
•Training new employees in the purchasing process and how to use the purchasing system.
•Other tasks as assigned
Job Requirement:
Purchasing Manager Requirements:
•Degree in business administration or a related field.
•Experience as a Purchasing Manager or in a similar position.
•Deep knowledge of inventory and supply chain management.
•Supervisory and management experience.
•Proficiency in Microsoft Office and purchasing software.
•Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal.
•Strong critical thinking and negotiation skills.
•Strong planning and organizational skills.
•Ability to work independently.
• Cambodian / Local Staff Only 


CONFIDENTIALITY 
•RESTRICTION ON PRESS RELEASE AND PUBLIC STATEMENTS 
To ensure that no press releases or public statements are made without the prior consent of DOSM 
•DIVULGING HOTEL INFORMATION 
The incumbent will not (either during or after his/her employment), without the hotel’s or Management’s written consent, divulge any information concerning the hotel or any associated hotels/companies or any of their dealings, transactions or affairs which may come to the incumbent’s knowledge during or in the course of his/her employment with the company. 

JOB DESCRIPTION
To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions. 

MEASURES OF GOOD PERFORMANCE
(a)Revenue targets achieved 
(b)Job knowledge
(c)Product knowledge
(d)Number of accounts 
(e)Effective communication- internal & external 
(f)Appearance 
(g)Punctuality 
(h)Attendance

company_name: China Construction Fourth Engineering Division (Cambodia) Corp. Ltd.
Company Profile: WHO WE ARE有关我们中国建筑第四工程局有限公司成立于1962年，现有职工18000人，是世界500强企业第37强“中国建筑工程股份有限公司”大型直属主力公司，中央驻粤大型建筑企业。中建四局拥有注册资本金4.35亿美元，总资产82亿美元，年产值100亿美元。下设有多个工程分公司，设备安装公司，装饰工程公司，路桥公司，机械化施工公司，建筑科研设计院、建筑设计院、房屋开发公司、投资公司、材料设备公司、岩土公司、监理公司以及十多家区域性公司等。中建四局凭借高素质的员工，先进的技术，精良的机械设备，以及完备的检测手段，向国内外客户提供标准化的服务。中建四局骨干企业均顺利通过了ISO9001或9002，ISO14001以及OHSAS18001管理体系认证。在国内，中建四局足迹遍及各省、市、港澳特别行政区，为国家经济建设做出了突出的贡献。国际上，同伊拉克、阿联酋、也门、阿尔及利亚、日本、新加坡、澳门、香港、美国、德国、塞浦路斯、巴基斯坦、南韩、博茨瓦纳、马来西亚、厄立特里亚、西萨摩亚等国家和地区的业主进行了卓有成效的、愉快的合作。中建四局于2015年初在柬埔寨注册成立了“中国建筑第四工程局（柬埔寨）有限公司”，强势进入当地建筑市场。China Construction Fourth Engineering Division Corp. Ltd was founded in 1962, with a staff body of 18000 people. It’s one of the eight engineering bureaus of China State Construction Engineering Corporation, Limited, which ranks 37th among FORTUNE 500 companies and one of the largest state-owned corporations based in Guangdong province. CCFED possesses a registered capital of over 435 million USD, 8.2 billion USD in assets, and makes 10 billion USD in annual revenue. We have such affiliated units as engineering subsidiaries, equipment installation company, construction decoration company, highway and bridge company, machinery construction company, construction science research institute, designing institute, housing development company, investment company, construction materials and equipment company, geologic works company, supervision company, as well as more than ten regional companies etc.Relying on its qualified personnel, up-to-date technology, superior mechanical equipment as well as complete testing means, the core companies of CCFED have all successfully passed the management system conformity of ISO9001 or 9002, ISO14001 and OHSAS18001,and offered standard service to the Clients both at home and abroad. At home, CCFED has put its footprint across the country, and has made a significant contribution to China’s economic construction. Internationally, it has experienced good and effective cooperation with its counterparts and customers in Indonesia, Iraq, U.A.E, Yemen, Algeria, Japan, Singapore, America, Germany, Cyprus, Pakistan, South Korea, Botswana, Malaysia, Eritrea, Western Samoa, etc.Early 2015, we established “CHINA CONSTRUCTION FOURTH ENGINEERING DIVISION (CAMBODIA) CORP. LTD” as our affiliate in Phnom Penh.WHAT WE DO

Job Description:
- Follow up and lead to do the standard land price and businesses profile.
- Assess and Analyze the Micro Loan product in the market.
- Train, share, coordinate, and support to branch staff about policies, memos, and guidelines related to loan
processing and correction their mistakes and/or errors of completing the loan documents. And contributing
good experiences about the loans.
- Follow up the performance and loan quality.
- Monitor and report about loan quality that approved by branch/Micro & MSME Lending Division (always
check the client overdue and report to own division).
- Conduct periodic internal controls and check on areas are concerned.
- Facilitate, monitor, and report about the partnership and then monitor the performance of Funding Raising
through online and dealing with new potential partners.
- Review credit guidelines and practices with management on an ongoing basis, recommending changes where necessary.
- Review and implement target planning of Micro & MSME Lending Division and relevant departments
effectively and in a responsible manner.
- Adhere to high ethical standards and comply with all regulations/applicable laws.
- Do refreshment to staffs on guideline, procedure, and improve weakness points timely or at least once
within 06 months.
- Raise up all lending issues from branches/subordinates and suggest the ways for improving to Deputy/Head of Micro Lending Department.
- Performing other various duties as assigned.

* Micro Loan Department Manager
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor of Business Administration in Management or Finance and Banking or in any related field.
- Sound working knowledge of Computer (Ms. Word, Ms. Excel, Flexcube, internet, and Email).
- At least three years’ experience in Microfinance or banking industry or another related field
- Acceptable written and verbal communication skills (Khmer and English).
- Good commitment in fieldwork and strong willing to work with rural people.
- Honesty, Initiative, creatively, high commitment and good inter-personal skill, and able to manage and lead team for success.
- Good understanding of MFI/banking rules and regulations in Cambodian.
- Strong leadership, facilitation, and management skills with the ability to make decisive decision in the tough circumstances.
