Job Description:
. Warehouse and inventory management
. Perform stock count and ensures that inventory counts are completed regularly and in a timely manner
. Prepare stock movement Report
. Develops, update and implements procedures to ensure all inventory is accounted for and reported accordingly to company policy
. Perform quality control of all products
. Staff management under supervision  
. Monitor and follow up all incoming and outgoing products
. Control goods delivery to destination place
. Ensures that inventory counts are completed regularly and in a timely manner
. Provides inventory analysis to support store operations throughout the physical and post inventory
. Support to all store regarding to proper stock/inventory control and report. 
. Manage and coordinate with all the staff members engaged in inventory control and inventory record accuracy.
. Ensure stock availability by maintaining optimal levels of stock at all times, foresee supply and demand, taking a strategic approach to replenishing so that both overstocking and running out of stock are avoided
. Handle purchases and transfer by carry out the entire phase of product purchasing, from selecting to tracking shipment and receiving orders, to ensure that purchases arrive on time and in good condition
. Take charge of internal stock transfers, moving products to other store branches
. Review daily inventory reports for possible errors and reports information to finance, operation and Merchandise department
. Maintain an accurate inventory of both stock items and transactions, noting down dates of purchase and receipt, item count and detail, issues encountered, and more, consolidate this into regular reports presented to other department units such as finance
. Report to upper management on stock levels, issues etc.…
. Arrange and store all the items in warehouse in proper location and ensure the warehouse always clean
. Effectively utilize all resources to maximum potential performance to achieve company goals
. Others tasks assigned by line manager.
Job Requirement:
. Bachelor’ s or associate degree in business administration, logistic or related fields is required 
. Must have at least 3 years inventory control management and supervisory experience
. Strong Microsoft Office skills includes: Excel, Word, PowerPoint and Database concepts
. Shows the ability to work well under pressure and very tight schedule
. Solid knowledge in inventory management related areas and should be familiar with the inventory management system.
. Excellent leadership skills, communication and interpersonal skills along with the ability to develop and maintain effective relations with the staff members by extending the necessary help and support will prove to be advantageous.
. Project management skills, investigative nature, advanced math and technical skills would beneficial
. The ability to effectively manage the subordinates, supervise them, plan, organise and control the work flow in a team environment
. Good organization and business administration skills, attention to detail, willingness to improve, learn and adapt in accordance with the modern practice methods
Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department   012 797 939 hr@mjqeducation.edu.kh Building #223 & 227, Mao Tse Tong Blvd., Sangkat Toul Svay Prey I, Khan Boeng Keng Kang, Phnom Penh 012 797 939

job title: Financial, Planning, Analysis and Control manager
position: Financial, Planning, Analysis and Control manager
Job Description:
- Obtain and maintain a thorough understanding of Group Financial Reporting and Country Financial Reporting requirements.
- Lead and drive the submission of monthly financial statements in Group Reporting Tool.
- Own Month-End Close Checklist, ensure the finance team has completed all JE postings and validate accounting entries on SAP before submission to Central.
- Ensure that the Balance Sheet and P&L postings in SAP are done in accordance with IFRS.
- Ensure intercompany postings are validated and correctly posted in SAP and also in Group Reporting Tool.
- Oversee on the bill-run to make sure the entries post under the respective gl codes and timing manner.  
- Lead monthly reconciliation of accounts between SAP and Group Reporting Tool.
- Review FTE data by local HR and own the reporting of FTE in Group Reporting Tool.
- Own reporting of core KPIs in Group Reporting Tool.
- Validate disputes by checking records and supporting documents for accuracy.
- Liaise with Group Accounting on Accounting Policies, applications and General Ledger Structure.
- Monitor cost trends on SAP and communicate any causes of unexpected variances.
- Continually automate, streamline, and improve current reporting, operational and accounting processes to improve business efficiency in the region.
Job Requirement:
- Strong Command of English (Written and Spoken)
- At least 5-6 years of experience in relevant Accounting or FP&A roles.
- Willingness and ability to adapt to a fast past business model and organizational changes that accompany a high-growth environment.
- Strong communication skills with the ability to bridge language barriers – you must be able to work collaboratively with diverse groups of people.
- CA, ACCA, CPA or equivalent professional qualification in Accounting.
- Demonstrable knowledge of IFRS, financial reporting and internal controls.
- Humility and the desire to challenge one’s self beyond comfort zone is essential for this role

Job Description:
- Regular monthly check-ins on overdue accounts – keep updated on all overdue accounts
- Make Calls to Clients with overdue accounts – work closely with PLB branches; attempt to locate & contact clients,
primarily over the phone, in order to talk with them about their debts, which includes calling customers at home, at
work & on their mobile phones.
- Negotiate Payment Schedules - negotiate payment plans & payment schedules that suit current financial situation
while still satisfying the debt.
- Advise Customers - on various payment options. If no payment agreement can be reached, customers are informed
of further actions that may be taken to collect overdue debts.
- Maintain Customer Files - keep customer files updated, recording times & dates that contact has been made, noting
information that customers have received about their debt.
- Prepare Statements - which will be given to credit departments & other institutions when customers fail to meet their
payment agreements or when no payment agreement can be made
- Write Letters - to customers to inform them of their debts. When customers fail to meet their payment obligations &
fail to make payment agreements, Collection Officers will write letters to credit agencies, insurance companies,
lawyers & customers’ employers to collect debt without the customer’s aid
- Answer Phones - answer incoming calls from customers & other individuals
- Follow up with PLB panel of lawyers – to carry out necessary legal actions to recover debts & loans
- Perform any & all related duties that may be required from time to time

* Retail Loan Processing Center
Job Requirement:
•	Bachelor degree in Finance, Accounting, Economics, Business or related field.
- Data entry– because of the need to enter information into digital systems, some data entry ability is essential
- Computer skills– requires good hands on working knowledge of computer skills
-Mathematics – basic math skills are required to work on financial figures & numbers
-2 years of relevant working experience in loan collections
- People skills – good use of persuasive techniques to collect overdue debts from customers:
- Communication skills –  good command of both written & verbal English & Khmer language; required to draft letters & speak clearly to clients about their payment options, employing persuasion & other tactics in order to collect debts on overdue accounts
- Attention to detail– must be detail-oriented professionals who take accurate & informative notes for client records & follow proper PLB process & procedures for debt collection

Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. Job Description:
* We are looking for a driven and experienced Store Manager, who will be reporting into the Head of Operations, to organize and oversee the daily operations of a warehouse in Cambodia. The successful candidate will ensure that our operations are well-coordinated and productive by managing a warehouse in Cambodia, setting up and implementing SOPs, and coaching the warehouse team to be operationally efficient.

- Coordinate the end-to-end warehouse processes, from inbound management to stock handling, storing, and order dispatching on a timely basis

Phillip Bank Plc. is a member of PhillipCapital Group which is headquartered in Singapore, and established since 1975. The Group offers a full range of quality and innovative services to retail, corporate and institutional customers and currently operates in over 15 countries including Australia, Cambodia, China (as well as Hong Kong), France, India, Indonesia, Japan, Malaysia, Singapore, Thailand, Turkey, UK, UAE, USA and Vietnam.

Job Description:
- Lead the operationalization of digital payment solutions on foodpanda’s platforms.
- Work in close cooperation with all divisions of our Regional and Global Digital Payments Teams and all key internal and external stakeholders.
- Coordinate with internal stakeholders to ensure that foodpanda users have the best customer experience while using foodpanda’s digital payment features.
- Ensure the smooth and efficient operations of all digital payments systems and instruments from an internal and external perspective.
- Ensure compliance of foodpanda’s digital payment features with relevant laws and regulations.
- Keep abreast with digital payment regulations and ensure alignment with foodpanda’s business objectives.
- Carry out market research to present the best practices in the world of online and digital money transactions and payments, to gather concrete customer insights and requirements, and to provide global benchmarks.
- Develop a streamlined process for subsequent rollouts of digital payment features of foodpanda across the country.
Job Requirement:
- At least five (5) years of relevant experience working in a company that offers digital payment solutions.
- Have at least 3 years of experience in working for an E-wallet company
- Strong experience of building and executing the strategy for digital payment solutions
- Strong experience in managing all business operations related to providing digital payment solutions.
- Strong experience in understanding the customer needs when it comes to digital payment solutions and scoping them in an efficient manner.
- Strong project management and organizational skills and the capability to handle complex projects.
- Very strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
- Able to work independently if required, and learn quickly and adapt to different roles in a growing Team.
- A sense of urgency, pragmatism and a solution-oriented approach to problem-solving.

Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
- Collaborating with engineers, architects etc. to determine the specifications of the project
- Negotiating contracts with external vendors to reach profitable agreements
- Obtaining permits and licenses from appropriate authorities
- Determine needed resources (manpower, equipment and materials) from start to finish with attention to budgetary limitations
- Plan all construction operations and schedule intermediate phases to ensure deadlines will be met
- Acquire equipment and material and monitor stocks to timely handle inadequacies
- Hire contractors and other staff and allocate responsibilities
- Supervise the work of laborers, mechanics etc. and give them guidance when needed
- Evaluate progress and prepare detailed reports
- Ensure adherence to all health and safety standards and report issues
Job Requirement:
- Master/Bachelor’s degree in Civil Engineering, Architecture, Construction Management
- At least 6 years of experience with real estate companies or with sizable construction organizations
- Proven experience as construction project manager
- In-depth understanding of construction procedures and material and project management principles
- Familiarity with quality and health and safety standards
- Good knowledge of MS Office
- Familiarity with construction/ project management software
- Outstanding communication and negotiation skills
- Excellent organizational and time-management skills
- A team player with leadership abilities

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Daily Accounting Operation Supporting
 Daily Accounting Operation Supporting

o Supervising and providing overall guidance to accounting officer as well as junior accounting staff.
o Accomplishes accounting human resource objectives by selecting, orienting, training, assigning, scheduling, coaching, counseling, and disciplining employees; communicating job expectations; planning, monitoring, appraising job contributions; recommending compensation actions; adhering to policies and procedures.
o Meets accounting operational standards by contributing financial information to strategic plans and reviews; implementing production, productivity, quality, and customer-service standards; resolving problems; identifying system improvements.
o Approves ledger entries by auditing transactions.
o Supports annual audit by providing information and answers to auditors.
o Accomplishes accounting and organization mission by completing related results as needed.
o Analyzing financial statements to ensure accuracy and compliance with generally accepted accounting practices.
o Performing reconciliations of general ledger accounts
o Oversee daily transactions, including accounts payable/receivable, general ledger and fixed asset, revenues and expenses, cash and bank reconciliations.
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
o Leading the accounting team to meet with the deadline report that requited by direct supervisor.

 Fixed Assets

o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Check month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist AM to prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Ensuring the Financial Report have been reconciled
o Prepare monthly Financial Note to support monthly FS Report
o Prepare monthly Sale and Revenues report
o Prepare monthly Sale and AR reconciliation 
o Prepare monthly Aging AP / AR report
o Prepare monthly Inter-company report 
o Monitoring revenue and expenses; cost allocation; consolidation, variance analysis and management reports.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support Finance Operation 
o Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports
o Assist FD, FM and AM to prepare P & P.

4. Accounting System Monitoring
o Accounting system knowledge
o Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Employee Handling
o To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
o take action in their individual development and welfare 
o To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs
o To be able to train them up to the standards required.
o To ensure that all employee good working relationship with all colleagues throughout the company 
o To assist in the training of the employees ensuring that they have the necessary skills to perform their duties with efficiency.
o To ensure that all employees have a complete understanding of the company’s policies and procedures. 
o To carry out any other reasonable duties and responsibilities as assigned.
o To be supervisor all accounting team leader and accounts clerk for admin task
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of progressive accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction Management or General Contracting or Subcontractor industry 
o Experience in job cost accounting and financial reporting
o Proven working experience as Accounting Manager, Accounting Supervisor, or Finance Manager
o Proven knowledge of book-keeping and accounting principles, practices, standards, laws, and regulations

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
- Coordinating and supervising construction workers
- Selecting tools and materials
- Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk
Job Requirement:
- Graduated in Civil Engineering
- At least 5 years’ experiences in related field
- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
8.ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ 
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
• Study in major Law, IR or Administration  ( BA )
• Good in English speaking writing reading 
• Over 1 to 3 years of work experience
• Fluent in English or Chinese language
• MS Office & Email
• Have knowledge on customer service or admin. 
• Strong skills in customer service and report

•	Update new law & regulations as per announcement from Ministry of Land Management for implementation on time.
•	Ensure corporate operations in compliance with local law and regulations

•	Oversees employee schedules to ensure coverage of front desk and attorney’s needs.

•	Provides supervisory oversight for the administrative support team for the Legal Services function.
•	Assists with providing performance evaluation feedback

•	Bachelor Degree or Master degree of Law
•	At least 2 or 3 years in Legal 
•	Strong team working skills
•	Active and willing to learn
•	Good communication
•	Willing to work under pressure

Job Description:
1.  General Admin Support
-  Prepare for internal request to purchase Office & Cleaning Supply, Stationary, employee uniform, and other relevant for monthly use
-  Handle employee’s mobile phone, phone allowance, HR fix asset, employee’s Insurance
-  Oversee building access card, employee card, employee’s parking
-  Manage & control on Admin Delivery Service 
-  Plan and organize administrative support activities

2.  Prepare monthly expense statement 
-  Prepare monthly statement to clear with Finance Division for both Petty Cash & Expense Reimbursement  
-  Manage & control of petty cash 

3.  Building Health & Safety
-  Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
-  Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
-  Oversee the security and cleaning of each business

4.  Lead & control Admin policy, discipline, and other tasks per assigned.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

Job Description:
1. ត្រួតពិនិត្យបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យា 
• ពិនិត្យលើសំណើរនៃការស្នើសុំធ្វើកិច្ចសន្យារបស់ផ្នែកលក់
• បែងចែកសំណើរទៅអោយផ្នែក Loan Contract ដើម្បីរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
2.ការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរជម្រើសបង់ប្រាក់ ជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃនៃការផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
3. ការស្នើទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើមជូនអតិថិជន
• ប្រឹក្សាយោបល់ជាមួយអតិថិជន អំពីជម្រើសនៃការទម្លាក់ប្រាក់ដើម
• បំពេញបែបបទនៃការស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
4.ធ្វើលិខិតបញ្ជាក់បង់ផ្តាច់ជូនអតិថិជន
• រៀបចំធ្វើលិខិតបង់ផ្ដាច់ជូនអតិថិជន ដោយមានភ្ជាប់ វិក័យប័ត្រ និង Statement 
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យចុះហត្ថលេខា និងទាក់ទងទៅអតិថិជនមកទទួល
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
5. រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់ ដើម្បីយកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ផ្ទុកឯកសារ
• ពិនិត្យរៀបចំកិច្ចសន្យា និងឯកសារស្នើសុំផ្លាស់ប្ដូរផ្សេងៗដែលបានធ្វើរួចរាល់
• យកទៅរក្សាទុកនៅបន្ទប់ដាក់ឯកសារ ដោយត្រូវដាក់តាមលេខសម្គាល់ឯកសារអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
6. ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់កម្រៃជើងសារ (Check Commission)
• ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ជាមួយNAV ដើម្បីរកផ្នែកលក់
• ដាក់ជូនថ្នាក់លើពិនិត្យ
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
7. ផ្ញើកុងត្រាទៅផ្នែកលក់ 
• ករណីអតិថិជននៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្តមិនអាចមកផ្ដិតមេដៃលើឯកសារនៅការិយាល័យភ្នំពេញបាន
• រៀបចំឯកសារទាំងអស់នោះដើម្បីផ្ញើរទៅតាមបណ្ដាខេត្ត
• បញ្ចូលក្នុងរបាយការណ៍ជាប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
8.ផ្ទៀងផ្ទាត់ និងបូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែ 
• ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
• បូកសរុបរបាយការណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាប្រចាំខែ
Job Requirement:
• Study in major Law, IR or Administration  ( BA )
• Good in English speaking writing reading 
• Over 1 to 3 years of work experience
• Fluent in English
• MS Office & Email
• Have knowledge on customer service or admin. 
• Strong skills in customer service and report

job title: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
position: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន

-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting
- To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
- To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 

2. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
- Verify daily/monthly/year to date sale report to support financial note and report to management
- Revenues recognition posting transaction to the system have been reviewed and verified.
- Daily AR receipt or cash collection posting transaction to the system have been review and verified

3. Prepare and Review Financial Monthly Report:
- Assist Accounting Manager to prepare the Monthly Financial - Report P&L, BS, CF to comply with Cambodia IFRS
- Prepare and verify monthly financial note to support monthly and yearly financial report.

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation:
- Support Finance Operation assigned by AM
- Support FD, FM and AM for other management reports

4. Accounting System Monitoring
- Accounting system knowledge
- Leading and support accounting team for using accounting system

5. Team management
- To assists in the training of accounting personnel as part of the effort to build an efficient team
- To take active in their individual develop and welfare
- To be familiar with the duties and responsibilities of all the team leaders & accounting staffs.
Job Requirement:
o Bachelor’s Degree in accounting and/or finance required
o At least five years of accounting experience
o Proven working experience in Construction or Real Estate is a plus 
o Experience in job cost accounting and/or financial reporting
o Proven working experience in management at least 2 years
o Proven knowledge of IFRS is a plus.

job title: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
position: Décor Engineer (កំពង់សោម)
Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Company Profile:
We are offering medical air transport service and charter flight that suits the patient and/ or customer need. We have cooperated with many stakeholder, both domestic and international to prepare prompt referral and provide an affordable service to our patients and/ or clients in accordance with the code of professional conduct.

For Medical Evacuation, We’re fully arrange the emergency team doctor to evaluate assess and accompany the patient from current hospital to TAMAC area in order to make transfer to the aircraft.

For VIP Charter flights, we offer patient service around the world with a set of documentation and/visa especially during this Covid- 19 period.

Job Description:
- Responsible for the monthly closing of books in SAP system including performing month end close related tasks in a timely manner in line with Group guidelines and IFRS.
- Be responsible for consumer reconciliation and comments.
- Supervision of the finance operation and billing team to make sure restaurants, riders, suppliers paid based on the payment term.
- Supervision of FP&A and finance control aspect through financial and management planning, information analysis, report and recommends.
- Support the finance payment operations teams in the country to complete all “procure to pay” (P2P) accounting and reconciliation activities.
- Work closely with the regional/global process owners and ensure all accounting activities of P2P processes are executed effectively and efficiently with appropriate controls and end to end view.
- Work closely with the payables and systems support team to continually automate, streamline, and improve current reporting, operational and reconciliation processes to improve business efficiency.
- Serve as the subject matter expert pertaining to finance operations relating to P2P processes.
- Improve the assembly and dissemination of meaningful financial data throughout the organization to assist in management's decision-making abilities.
- Performance other tasks assigned by management team.
Job Requirement:
- Proven work experience as a Finance Manager or similar role
- At least 5 years of accounting experience in finance operations roles with deep expertise in P2P and related finance and accounting processes.
- Able to work collaboratively with diverse groups of people at all levels throughout an organization in a multi-country environment.
- Willingness and ability to adapt to the rapid business and organizational changes that accompany a high-growth environment.
- Proficiency in accounting software
- Leadership abilities and excellent knowledge of data analysis and forecasting models
- BA/MBA in Accounting, Finance. Relevant certification (e.g. ACCA/CPA) is a plus

Job Description:
- Lead the operationalization of digital payment solutions on foodpanda’s platforms.
- Work in close cooperation with all divisions of our Regional and Global Digital Payments Teams and all key internal and external stakeholders.
- Coordinate with internal stakeholders to ensure that foodpanda users have the best customer experience while using foodpanda’s digital payment features.
- Ensure the smooth and efficient operations of all digital payments systems and instruments from an internal and external perspective.
- Ensure compliance of foodpanda’s digital payment features with relevant laws and regulations.
- Keep abreast with digital payment regulations and ensure alignment with foodpanda’s business objectives.
- Carry out market research to present the best practices in the world of online and digital money transactions and payments, to gather concrete customer insights and requirements, and to provide global benchmarks.
- Develop a streamlined process for subsequent rollouts of digital payment features of foodpanda across the country.
Job Requirement:
- At least five (5) years of relevant experience working in a company that offers digital payment solutions.
- Have at least 3 years of experience in working for an E-wallet company
- Strong experience of building and executing the strategy for digital payment solutions
- Strong experience in managing all business operations related to providing digital payment solutions.
- Strong experience in understanding the customer needs when it comes to digital payment solutions and scoping them in an efficient manner.
- Strong project management and organizational skills and the capability to handle complex projects.
- Very strong analytical and troubleshooting skills.
- Able to work independently if required, and learn quickly and adapt to different roles in a growing Team.
- A sense of urgency, pragmatism and a solution-oriented approach to problem-solving.

Job Description:
- Formulate and execute the local customer experience strategy in order to deliver on the global and local targets and priorities.
- Take an active part in developing the local commercial strategy and contribute actively to the area/global Customer Service strategy.
- Maintain a dynamic and scalable customer service organization in which resources are managed effectively and efficiently.
- Cultivate customer relationship and listen to the voice of customers.
- Drive continuous improvement, monitor performance against established KPIs and targets; take corrective actions as required.
- Is accountable to own, create, maintain and test a business continuity plan for critical customer processes across products.
- Drive all aspects of Commercial intelligence within the team and share knowledge to other teams. This includes driving customer and industry knowledge within the customer service organisation.
Job Requirement:
- Over 5 years of experience in a Commercial/Customer facing role preferably handling major global clients within the Ocean industry.
- Minimum experience of handling 3 or more team members in a managerial capacity.
- A graduate or post graduate degree in Marine operations/International trade/Business management or any allied degree.
- Complete fluency in written and spoken English. Proficiency in Mandarin is desirable.
- Knowledge of Ocean shipping operations, including freight forwarding, port operations and legal compliance.
- Customer Centricity - Is dedicated to meeting the expectations and requirements of internal and external customers and gets first hand customer information and uses it for improvements in products and services. Is able to establish and maintains effective relationships with customers and gains their trust and respect.
- Collaboration – Is able to collaborate effectively with internal and external stakeholders – takes in relevant views, delivers on commitment to each and able to influence and align towards the common objective at customer and country level.
- Develop team – Is able to hire the right talent and diagnose and design joint solutions to build their capability. Further is able to keep team engaged and motivated to deliver on the common objective.
Company Profile:
The A.P. Moller – Maersk Group was founded in 1904 in Denmark. Since then, the Group has grown into the largest shipping & logistics provider in the world. It has more than 300 offices and representations in over 100 countries worldwide employing more than 76,000 people. The activities, apart from shipping and logistics, include industry, retail, shipbuilding as well as oil & gas exploration.

Maersk Cambodia, its affiliated company, has been supporting the Cambodian trade since 1992, being one of the first international container shipping companies to serve the Cambodian market. It remains one of the largest container shipping lines operating in Cambodia today.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mr. Chanra  +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482 von.chanra@maersk.com VTrust Tower- 7th floor, No. Plot A, Street 169, Phum 12, Sangkat Vealvong, Khan 7 Makara Cambodia +855 2396 5671 / +855 96 673 6482

Job Description:
Position Summary:
- Expedite full processes of LCL Business Mode for both Import / Export and customs activities to ensure that shipments are arranged and delivered bases on SOP, IOP, CLP & Customers’ Expectations. 
- System Data Input to issue Bill of Lading, Invoices, Create PO and Cost Checking, then follow up details for filing of AMS, ACI, AFR, ISF…., Monitoring LCL Operation Flow from Start to End. 
- Coordinate with all related parties/ stakeholders to ensure smooth operations and problem solving on timely manner 
- Deliver services performance & customers’ KPIs; proactively initiate preventive and corrective action 
plans for further improvement. 
- Be responsible for job costing, following-up billing and payment in timely manner

Key Responsibilities
- Expedite daily operations of LCL Shipment and customs activities of assigned accounts 
- Proper co-ordination with Customers, Customer Service teams, CFS Warehouse and 3PL provider for stuffing plan and/to arrange services on scheduled, for timely collection and dispatch of shipments. 
- Proactively attend all the inquiries from Customers and Customer Service teams, well communication with related parties in case of exceptions. 
- Prepare SOPs & IOPs in collaboration with Customer, Sale, Procurement, Implementation and Products and 3PL providers 
- Take ownership of the issues and perform problem resolution. 
- Ensuring compliance to internal & external audit controls; process efficiency and delivering operational KPIs. 
- Drive operational excellence through KPI measurement and analysis. 
- Able to work independently with the limit supervision from higher level. 
- Enhance productivity & performance with initiatives in operation. 
- Actively contribute initiatives to support process improvements, payment process with cost-saving requirement. 
- Take every opportunity to expand on services in scope of solution design and new business 
development. 
- Carry out ad-hoc tasks assigned by Team Leader/ Manager
Job Requirement:
- Possess 2+ years’ experience related working experience in LCL Import - Export Operation 
- Possess practical knowledge & experience in LCL Consolidation, customs formalities operations, Freight Booking to Carriers, Shipping Vessels Schedule for LCL Vessel Connection  
- Experience in Finance Operation of Cost Checking, Issue Billing for LCL Business Mode with some knowledge of Tax Regulation. 
- Experience in working and managing vendors/ sub-contractors 
- Possess practical knowledge & Experience in customs formalities operations & transportation 
handling: container pick up/drop off; OOG container handling. 
- Processing for apply Certificate of origin/ quality, HS code classification 
- Computer literacy, especially in outlook email, excel, power point 
- English 
- Possess can-do and willing-to-do attitude 
- Teamwork, Discipline and Integrity

Company Profile:
We do this by delivering innovative packaging that offers significant value for brand owners, retailers and consumers alike. This is no small achievement, since value means something different to each of these stakeholders.

Crown’s creative packaging solutions are well-suited to address each of these interpretations of “value” thanks to the inherent properties of metal and the innovation that has taken place throughout our company’s history.

We are proud to be the leader in metal packaging technology. With operations in 47 countries employing over 33,000 people and net sales of $11.6 billion, we are uniquely positioned to bring best practices in quality and manufacturing to growing economies in Asia, Eastern Europe, South America and the Middle East and North Africa. Whether improving existing technology or pioneering a new concept, we are committed to working in partnership with our customers to drive their businesses locally and globally.

So whether you are getting to know Crown for the first time, or are a long-time friend, this site will provide the resources you need to increase turnover at the retail shelf, add differentiation and build consumer loyalty - in short, to use innovative packaging as a powerful means to build stronger brands.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  023 900 838 (Telegram: 081444646) hr-crownkhmer@crowncork.com.sg Phum Prey Sar Lech, Sangkat Prey Sar, Khan Dangkor, Phnom Penh, Kingdom of Cambodia. 023 900 838 (Telegram: 081444646)

Job Description:
Reporting to: Software Development Director/Android Development Lead
Salary Range: 600 – 1000 USD

(high- level summary/overview of key duties and scope of job)

We are looking for an Android Developer responsible for the development and maintenance of applications aimed at a range of Android devices including mobile application, tablet application, POS terminal application and ATM Kiosk application. Your primary focus will be the development of Android applications and their integration with back-end services. You will be working along-side other engineers and developers working on different layers of the infrastructure. Therefore, commitment to collaborative problem solving, sophisticated design, scalable, maintainable, creating quality, and highly available of product that meet business objectives and SLAs is essential.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
(Categorize tasks and provide a brief overview or outline of their responsibilities. Note: the Categories will be used as a reference in designing KPIs)
• Maintain and develop Android Applications and Web Application
• Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
• Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable Java code
• Ensure the best possible performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
• Assist Business Development to design work flows of new Pi Pay products and services
• Perform software maintenance, system backup, database backup, and system version upgrades 
• Monitor performance and ensure wallet system availability and reliability
• Monitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning of wallet system
• Select and implement development solutions, policies, and procedures in conjunction with the company’s network and infrastructure team
• Provide Level-2/3 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues
• Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the software development
• Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution
Job Requirement:
EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE 
(List of description of the experience, knowledge, skills and abilities required)

• Bachelor Degree in Computer Science and Engineering
• Experiences in Android Application Development and Web Development at least 1 years
• Strong experience  with Kotlin, Java, React native, Angular native, Ionic, Meteor, or any frameworks
• Experiences with JSP, Spring framework, and Tomcat Catalina is preferred
• Experience in Database Server with MS SQL and Oracle is preferred
• Strong knowledge of Android SDK, difference versions of Android, and difference screen sizes
• Familiarity with RESTful API, SOAP, XML Web Service, JSON to connect Android applications to back-end service
• Understanding of Google’s Android design principles and interface guidelines, patterns, and best practices
• Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
• Ability to design applications around natural user interfaces, such as “touch”
• Knowledge of the open-source Android ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical requirements
• Familiarity with Firebase, cloud message API, and push notifications
• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git, Mercurial, or SVN
• Familiar with continuous integration
• Good communication, facilitation and interpersonal skills
• Very good in speaking, writing English 
• Good interpersonal, analytical and communication skills both in Khmer and English
Company Profile:
Pi Pay: The Most Innovative Way to Pay

Pi Pay is the most innovative and complete cashless payment platform in Cambodia - built around a consumer-facing app that incorporates merchant payment and money transfer services with a range of social and lifestyle features including Chat, Maps and Friend Finder, and a growing network of retail partners in the Kingdom.

Job Description:
Reporting to: IT Director/Core System Manager
Salary Range: 1000 – 2000 USD

(high- level summary/overview of key duties and scope of job)

Core System Lead is responsible for controlling and supporting system's user over all issues concerning mobile wallet system, bank partners and telco partners, Alipay/WeChat/UPI backend system, Conductor; Daily (working hours) maintenance and monitoring of above stated system to keep them in stable service 24/7; if necessary change time to night shift, simulating, applying all fixes and patches issues by vendors of above stated applications to keep them up to date in terms of functionality, productivity and security. The post holder will provide project support services in support of information governance and security. To liaise with departmental users on how the core systems are being used, making recommendations on future developments of the systems, working closely with the software designers on future amendments.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
(Categorize tasks and provide a brief overview or outline of their responsibilities. Note: the Categories will be used as a reference in designing KPIs)

• To control and support of mobile wallet’s user overall customer/merchant/POS terminal issues concerning of core system
• Maintain and develop Core System and related APIs
• Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable client and server-side code
• Ensure the best possible security, performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
• Assist Business Development to design work flows of new Pi Pay products and services
• Prepare user requirement, functional requirement, technical requirement documents and other documents related to software developments
• Research new technology for application and database development including mobile technology 
• Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors
• To control and support of bank partners, telco partners, Alipay / WeChat/UPI Backend’s user over all merchants and POS terminal issues
• To prepare mobile wallet system configuration document.
• To provide advice, training and support in the use of the core systems to members of staff, when and if required.
• To be able to utilize testing tools; SaopUI or Postman to perform all kind of API test with XML Web Service, REST API and ISO messages … etc.
• To control and support of Conductor.
• To simulate, apply all fixes and patches issues by vendors of core systems to keep them up to date in terms of functionality, productivity and security.
• To ensure core systems are maintained and kept up to date (with upgrades, patches and hot fixes) at all times.
• To assist with the testing and implementation of upgrades to existing systems directed.
• To assist in the definition, implementation and review of procedures related to the use of core systems.
• To provide help and advice to users regarding system functionality.
• To maintain all necessary documentation and retain necessary records for the safe and effective use of designated systems.
• To provide system administration of designated systems, including access control, fault management, change control and all routine processes to ensure systems have maximum availability and maintain effectiveness.
• To maintain user access control for all designated systems, ensuring that password management policy is adhered to, reporting any suspected security breeches
• To monitor data quality standards for designated systems, reviewing audit logs at system level, and taking appropriate action. Where necessary, escalating issues as appropriate. 
• To assist the Core Systems Manager in identifying and monitoring data quality issues to agreed standards; to support agreed action, enforce standards to ensure consistency where appropriate.
• To perform daily (working hours) maintenance and monitoring of above stated systems in order to keep them in service 24/7 (only for those systems which must be 24/7) and reporting to supervisor about any errors, slowness or unavailability of services. If necessary change time to night shift, must to obey the Night Shift rule.
• To work with partners and vendors relate core systems and system integrations.
Job Requirement:
EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE 
(List of description of the experience, knowledge, skills and abilities required)
• Experiences in System Application Development at least 1 years
• Strong experiences with Java Spring framework.
• Strong experiences in software development using OOP, and Design Pattern
• Experience with RDBMS such as MySQL, Postgres, or Oracle is preferred
• Experience with in-memory data structure store and distributed memory such as Memcached or Redis is plus
• Experience with authentication and authorization service with Single-Sign-On, Token, JWT, OAuth2.0.
• Familiarity with RESTful API, SOAP, XML Web Service, JSON, or ISO to connect with other back-end services
• Knowledge in information security (OWASP) and data encryption
• Knowledge in hosting and maintenance applications with Apache, Tomcat, Nginx, etc. 
• Knowledge of the open-source ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
• Proficient understanding of code versioning tools such as Git
• Good interpersonal, analytical and communication skills both in Khmer and English

Job Description:
Job Objective: Under the direction and guidance of the QA Lead, the Quality Assurance Officer would be responsible in testing V2 mobile app, POS app, Backend systems, as well as creating test cases and supporting other teams whom face challenges.

KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Research and Learning: 
- Research on customer needs, new products, and trending technologies.
- Research and learn about new systems and requirements.
- Identify potential product features for contemporary and future markets. 

Quality Assurance:
- Perform testing on new products, including possible proprietary items, according to the organization’s Product Development plans to ensure that bugs and issues are reduced to a minimum level. The testing includes functionality testing, performance testing, network connectivity testing, user interface testing, battery life testing, etc…  
- Continue testing on existing features in order to avoid side effects of new released features and keep track on app performance to avoid any kind of inconveniences including slowness, flickering, etc… 
- Create and assist in the development of test case documentation for new products or product changes – documentation should be described in detail of each possible case scenario, which must include the steps of how each behavior is replicated.
- Work closely with the development team to report issues that have been found and reported, explain how they were replicated, and follow up on progress to make sure that issues are properly fixed on time and based on requirements.
- Take part in research and surveys on customer needs, new products, and trending technologies.
- Perform other duties as requested by Management from time to time.
Problem Resolution: 

Based on his/her experience, he/she is additionally tasked with the identification of issues in development by all related parties and developers.
IT:
- Assist team in testing company core system.
- Understand development flow and have experience with analysis.
- Understand system integration and development.

Support:
- Support teams on training
- Support teams on software problem troubleshooting
- Support development team on writing new feature use cases
Job Requirement:
EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE
- University student with bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Management Information System or equivalent
- Experience in quality assurance - functionality test, performance test, network connectivity test, UX/UI test, …
- Having knowledge in software development – web or mobile application - is a must
- Knowing how to use mobile app automation testing tools is a plus  
- Good verbal and written English communication skill
- Ability to explain technical aspects in simplified terms
- Strong task and time organizational skill 
- Ability to work on own and with team

Job Description: The administrative manager will hire, train, and evaluate administrative team members; develop, review, and improve policies, systems, and procedures; and generally ensure the office operates smoothly and efficiently.To succeed as an administrative manager, you should be focused on attracting and retaining top talent and streamlining office operations to maximize quality and efficiency while reducing costs. You should be analytical, knowledgeable, and organized with a proactive attitude and strong leadership skills.Responsibilities:• Supervising the day-to-day operations of the administrative department and staff members.• Hiring, training, and evaluating employees and taking corrective action when necessary.• Developing, reviewing, and improving administrative systems, policies, and procedures.• Ensuring the office is stocked with necessary supplies and that all equipment is working and properly maintained.• Working with the accounting and management teams to set budgets, monitor spending, and process payroll and other expenses.• Planning, scheduling, and promoting office events, including meetings, conferences, orientations, and training sessions.• Collecting, organizing, and storing information using computers and filing systems.• Overseeing special projects and tracking progress towards company goals.• Building and expanding on skills by engaging in educational opportunities.
Job Requirement: • Bachelor’s degree in business administration, management, or a related field.• 5-7 years of experience in a related field and at the managerial level• Exceptional leadership and time, task, and resource management skills.• Strong problem solving, critical thinking, coaching, interpersonal, and verbal and written communication skills.• Proficiency with computers, especially MS Office.• Ability to plan for and keep track of multiple projects and deadlines.• Familiarity with budget planning and enforcement, human resources, and customer service procedures.

Job Description:
Reporting to: Software Development Director/Back-End Development Lead
Salary Range: 1000 – 2000 USD

(high- level summary/overview of key duties and scope of job)
Back-End Developer to develop and maintain back-end applications and integrate partners’ web services/restful API for Pi Pay Web, Android, and iOS application. You will be part of a team that is responsible for designing and developing scalable, maintainable, highly available of product that meet business objectives and SLAs.

KEY ACCOUNTABILITIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
(Categorize tasks and provide a brief overview or outline of their responsibilities. Note: the Categories will be used as a reference in designing KPIs)

• Maintain and develop Web Front-End and Web Back-End Application
• Maintain and develop Java Back-end projects and Admin Portal
• Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable client and server-side code
• Ensure the best possible security, performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
• Assist Business Development to design work flows of new Pi Pay products and services
• Prepare user requirement, functional requirement, technical requirement documents and other documents related to software developments
• Research new technology for application and database development including mobile technology 
• Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors
• Translate designs and wireframes into high quality code
• Design, build, and maintain high performance, reusable, and reliable client and server-side code
• Ensure the best possible security, performance, quality, and responsiveness of the application
• Identify and correct bottlenecks and fix bugs
• Assist Business Development to design work flows of new Pi Pay products and services
• Conduct user acceptance test (UAT) process for new system development, customization, and upgrading
• Perform software maintenance, system backup, database backup, and system version upgrades 
• Monitor performance and ensure wallet system availability and reliability
• Monitor system resource utilization, trending, and capacity planning of wallet system
• Select and implement development solutions, policies, and procedures in conjunction with the company’s network and infrastructure team
• Prepare user requirement, functional requirement, technical requirement documents and other documents related to software developments
• Provide Level-2/3 support and troubleshooting to resolve issues
• Work within established configuration and change management policies to ensure awareness, approval and success of changes made to the software development
• Research new technology for application and database development including mobile technology 
• Liaise with vendors and other IT personnel for problem resolution
• Perform other tasks assigned by supervisors
Job Requirement:
EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE 
(List of description of the experience, knowledge, skills and abilities required)

• Bachelor Degree in Computer Science and Engineering
• Experiences in Web Front-end and Back-end Application Development at least 2 years
• Strong experiences in software development using OOP, Design Pattern, MVC, MVVM
• Strong experiences with any server-side programming such as Java EE, Java Spring framework, JSP, VB.NET, C#, ASP.NET MVC, .NET CORE, PHP, PHP Laravel Framework, Node.js, and etc.
• Strong experiences with any client-side programming such as JavaScript, jQuery, TypeScript, AngularJS, ReactJS, Vue.js, and etc.
• Strong experiences with HTML5, CSS3, Bootstrap, WebPack, LESS, SaSS, etc.
• Strong experience with RDBMS such as MS SQL, MySQL, Postgres, MariaDB, or Oracle is preferred
• Experience with No SQL Database such as MongoDB, Firebase, Couchbase, or Hadoop is plus
• Experience with in-memory data structure store and distributed memory such as Memcached or Redis is plus
• Familiarity with RESTful API, SOAP, XML Web Service, JSON, or ISO to connect with other back-end services
• Basic knowledge in authentication and authorization service with Single-Sign-On, Token, JWT, OAuth2.0, Identity Sever, OTP, SMS server, etc.
• Basic knowledge in information security (OWASP) and data encryption and hashing such as PKI, AES, RSA, and SHA
• Knowledge in hosting and maintenance applications with Apache, Tomcat, IIS, Nginx, etc. on cloud servers such as Digital Ocean, AWS, Google Cloud, etc.
• Experience with offline storage, threading, and performance tuning
• Ability to design applications around natural user interfaces, such as “touch”
• Knowledge of the open-source ecosystem and the libraries available for common tasks
• Ability to understand business requirements and translate them into technical and functional requirements
• Familiarity with Realtime database and push notifications such as Firebase, Google Cloud messaging, Apple push, SignalR, or Sig

job title: Call Centre Agent (Chinese Speaking 4p and English Speaking 1p) Full & Part-time
position: Call Centre Agent (Chinese Speaking 4p and English Speaking 1p) Full & Part-time
Job Description:
1.  Call Center agent (Chinese Speaking) work from 8am to5pm (x2) 
2.  Call Center agent (English speaking) work from 5pm to 2am (x1) 
3.  Call Center agent (Chinese Speaking ) work from 5pm to 2am (x2)

1. Purpose: 
• This position is responsible for the delivery of service excellence for all calls received within the Call Centre.
• This includes providing accurate and relevant product information and understanding the requirements of customers.

2. Main responsibilities:
• Monitoring and actively managing variances from agreed performance targets, through identifying and understanding the causes and taking corrective action to minimize risk and maximize performance.
• Generating new sound profitable business by creating referral networks, including internal business relationships, existing customers and local market activities.
• Maximize and sustain performance and achieve agreed targets.
• Provide friendly and responsive customer service on the phone to both internal and external customers by using excellent customer service skills
• Answer customer enquiries on the phone relative to products, procedures, interest rates, exchange rates or refer to appropriate area for action
• Handling customer complaints or refer them to appropriate area for action
• Accurately identifying a customer’s query and providing a quick resolution
• Customer Service Standard:
o Using Pi Pay Welcome phrase
o Address customer appropriately (Use customer name)
o Friendly and Professional answering and asking customer questions
o Complete transaction & ask if the customer has any additional needs.
o Thank customer and bid farewell to customer using their  name
o Keeping the customer up to date with the progress of any escalated enquiries.
o Selling of additional products and functionality where possible to the advantage of the customer
• Be a proactive team participant, contributing to an environment where members are proud to be part of , passionate about customers and eager to make the team succeed.
• Take ownership of your continuing professional development, documenting your development plan and tracking your development.
• Ensure sharing of “best practice” ideas
• Embracing and supporting changes
• Mainly take care and provide the service for card and acquiring business
Job Requirement:
• Degree/Professional qualifications or equivalent.
• No experience or mini 1 year experience 
• Skill on data entry and good at MS office. 
• Good communication and negotiation skills to maintain interpersonal customer relationships.

Job Description:
This role is responsible for the important task of risk controlling for card issuing and card acquiring for Pi Pay. Develop and execute the policy and strategy in order to prevent risks, lead the team to perform daily risk monitoring and analyze for chargeback for both consumers and merchants. 
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES
Responsibilities of the job may vary according to the skills of the candidate. However, typical tasks include:
- Leading, developing and executing high-level Risk Strategic Functions in line with Pi Pay’s cards services and procedures
- Monitoring and regulating high-risk and suspicious transactions, relevant report generation, and real-time management reporting
- Identifying area/s of potential risk for new transactions, new merchants and new cardholders 
- Assisting in fraud investigations
- Control on the chargeback team when handling dispute with issuing and acquiring bank
- Monitor and analyze the chargeback risks according to card type.
- Update and enhance the process for risk and fraud controls, continually improve policies and procedures base on up to date transaction behaviors best suited for the business needs
- PIN controlling
- Dispute resolution for card transactions including processing refunds and/or debits to cardholders or merchants or writing off transactions
Job Requirement:
EXPERIENCE & EXPERTISE
- 2  - 3 years experience in similar field
- Knowledgeable on risk management control, understands the risk parameter set up and risk analytics
- Strong knowledge in Visa, UPI rules & regulations, including merchant acquiring and issuing as well as VISA, UPI dispute resolution, chargeback and other regulations
- Knows related  Fraud/ Risk reports and reporting procedures
- Good communication skills in solving customer complaints
- Good English both speaking and writing

Company Profile:
GBS is a one-stop company for coffee and tea solutions, which is reflected in our logo. Founded in 2016, GBS mission was to foster Cambodian coffee industry through the 3 pillars – product, service and knowledge.
At GBS, we always look out to bring top quality products from around the world to combine with our best-in-class after-sales service. We are currently representing more than 20 brands in Cambodian market including, Nuova Simonelli, Victoria Arduino, Caffé Barbera, Lavazza, Hario, Iberital, Eureka, ODK, Blendtec, Hoshizaki, Melitta, Proaster, D&B, Monbana, Acaia, 3M Water Filtration, and others.
Acknowledging the complication of establishing or expanding a coffee business, thanks to a wide range of product offer, GBS focuses on providing a solution-based product package according to the customers’ individual request and business demand.
We offer complementary training as our barista demonstrates their skill and know-how to assist customer for the challenges in the coffee business environment. We also offer advanced barista and latte art classes for those who would like to further develop their skills.
We take pride in our technical service, as we receive many positive feedbacks since our day one in business. We invest significantly in spare parts to ensure our customer’s machine downtime is limited to the minimum. To compliment this, we ensure that our technicians are well-trained with technical knowledge and are always ready to respond to request for maintenance and repairs.
In 2018, GBS established B-Hub Barista Training Center to offer high quality barista training with tools and resources that allow student to dive deeper into a coffee world. In 2019, GBS began moving toward commercial and specialty coffee roasting, adding three more coffee blends into our product portfolio, as well as customizing special blends to meet the demand. In May 2020, we welcome our new showroom in Siem Reap, which is 40% bigger in space with a dedicated training room.
With all
Contact Info: Contact Information HR HR Manager 069 900 550  career@gbscambodia.com #103E0, St.273,Sk Toul Sangke, Kh Russey Keo. Phnom Penh   069 900 550

Job Description:
* Marketing Assistant Job Description

Our company is looking to hire a marketing assistant who will be working closely with our marketing team to develop and implement marketing plans and strategies for our brands. As a successful hire, you will be tasked with helping identify marketing trends and opportunities for growth, as well as creating marketing materials such as white papers and case studies. You will be giving presentations about our ongoing campaigns and provide administrative support to our marketing and sales teams.
To be chosen for this role, you must have a bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field. Prior work experience in administration, sales, or marketing is a plus. Effective written and verbal communication skills and a high level of attention to detail are both important keys to success in this role.

* Marketing Assistant Responsibilities:

• Collaborating with the marketing manager, internal teams, clients and partners on marketing strategy.
• Helping identify marketing trends and key opportunities for innovation.
• Learning and working with various types of software for digital marketing.
• Working closely with sales and marketing department.
• Creating marketing materials such as white papers, case studies, and presentations.
• Giving presentations.
• Maintaining a marketing database.
• Providing administrative support to the marketing and sales team.
• Preparing, formatting and editing a range of documents.
• Understanding company product and brand.
•General office duties.
• Creating and interpreting a variety of reports.
• Organizing market research.
• Analyzing questionnaires and other forms of feedback.
• Updating social media accounts.
Job Requirement: * Marketing Assistant Requirements:• Bachelor’s degree in marketing, business or related field.• Administration or sales and marketing assistant experience.• Effective written and verbal communication skills.•A high level of attention to detail.• Ability to work effectively within a team and independently.• Experience using computers for a variety of tasks.• Competency in Microsoft applications including Word, Excel, and Outlook.• Good organization skills.• Related job and internship experience.•Digital marketing experience.* GBS offer a competitive benefit such as• Salary and annual salary adjustment• Health and accident insurance• Annual trip and party • Extra incentive and allowance  • Work time 44h /1w (8am -5pm)• Holiday and Public Holiday  • Annual Leave, sick leave, maternity leave, etc…• Staff Birthday•Other benefits - Address: Showroom: #103E0, St.273,Sk Toul Sangke, Kh Russey Keo. Phnom Penh - Contact:  +885 11 999 840 / 069 900 550
