Company Profile:
Established in 1996, Creed Group is a Japanese real estate investment group with a primary focus on the Southeast and South Asia real estate market. Our portfolio ranges from Real Estate Investment, Asset Management, Project Development to Property Management. To date, we have amassed an aggregate Gross Development Value (GDV) of US$800 million for our projects.
Before focusing on the emerging markets of Southeast and South Asia, we had amassed nearly 14 years of experience in the mature real estate market in Japan. Through our abundant expertise from Japan, and forming strategic partnerships with the best local players in respective countries, we are dedicated to providing the best Japanese quality development for promising emerging markets.
Currently, our business spans across 9 countries including Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Lao PDR and Cambodia.

Job Description:
Main Responsibilities of Project Administrator:
• Schedule routine meetings and record decisions (e.g. next steps, assigned tasks etc.)
• Break complex projects into simpler tasks and set goals and timeframes
• Create and update workflows

Duties:
A Project Administrator manages schedules, arranges assignments, prepares action plans, analyzes risks/opportunities, gathers necessary resources and communicates progress to team members. The ultimate goal is ensuring the projects of a company are completed within the restraints of time, quality, and budget.
Responsibilities:
• Scheduling routine meetings and recording decisions (e.g. next steps, assigned tasks etc.)
• Breaking complex projects into simpler tasks and setting goals and timeframes
• Creating and updating workflows
• Measuring and reporting on the project performance
• Acting as the contact point for all project participants
• Monitoring progress of the project and also addressing potential issues
• Coordinating quality controls for ensuring the deliverables meet client demands
• Retrieving necessary information such as related case studies and client/user requirements
• Tracking expenses and predicting future costs
• Conducting risk analyses
• Preparing and providing documentation to key stakeholders and internal teams
• Ordering resources (e.g. software and equipment)

Other Benefits
1- Free accommodation, Water, Electricity
2- Over Time
3- Night Bonus
4- Insurance (Infinity Insurance) 
5- 2 meals per day at the canteen, monthly meal deduction based on monthly attendant.
6- Free Laundry
Job Requirement:
Requirements
• At least a Bachelor’s degree in Business Administration or a relevant field
• Additional certification is a plus
• Prior experience as a Project Coordinator, Project Administrator or a similar role
• Experience with project management software such as  MS Project
• Experience with technical documentation, flowcharts, and schedules
• Ability to work in a fast-paced team environment
• Strong multitasking skills with the ability to prioritize tasks
• Problem-solving skills with a keen eye for details
• Exceptional time-management and organizational skills
• Strong verbal as well as written communication skills

Deadline: 15 January 2022.

Job Description:
Quantity Surveyor Duties and Responsibilities
• Review architectural plans and prepare quantity needs
• Estimate the quantity and costs of materials
• Prepare contracts and documents
• Set budgets for payments, inventory needs, and materials
• Analyze costs for maintenance and additional building needs
• Track changes in plans or constructions; update budgets
• Negotiate with contractors and subcontractors
• Hire and document contractors and subcontractors
• Act as a liaison between clients and site managers/engineers
• Keep track of construction materials and inventory
• Identify potential financial or construction risks
• Advise clients on improvements, strategies, and/or estimated costs
• Prepare payments for contractors and subcontractors
• Document progress, materials, and reports on project
• Advise on property taxes, regulations, and local laws
• Source maintenance costs and facilities management for clients
• Develop and maintain working relationships with contractors and subcontractors
• Utilize software to calculate, record, and track inventory and estimates
• Analyze completed projects to determine ROI and compare costs
Job Requirement:
Quantity Surveyor Requirements and Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree in quantity surveying, construction engineering, management, or related field
• 2-3 years of general construction estimating experience, financial experience, construction experience, or related field
• Proficient in computer skills and Microsoft Office Suite
• Able to analyze financial records and apply data to improved results
• Strong aptitude for numbers, spreadsheets, and financial reports
• Experienced at compiling and following strict budgets; strong estimating and financial analysis skills
• In-depth understanding of construction, materials, pricing, and industry
• Able to analyze problems and strategize for better solutions

Deadline: 15 January 2022.

Job Description:
• Researches, programs, plans, designs, and administers building projects for clients, applying knowledge of architectural design, construction detailing, construction procedures, zoning and building codes, and building materials and systems.
• Produces conceptual plans, renderings, and documents.
• Plans and programs layout of project(s); coordinates and integrates engineering elements into unified design for client review and approval.
• Utilizes computer-assisted design software and equipment to prepare project designs and plans.
• Produces construction documents in AutoCAD, Sketch up and Revit.
• Working with the Project Manager, may direct, supervise, and check activities of workers engaged in preparing drawings and specification documents for the Conceptual Design Phase, Schematic Design Phase, and/or the Detailed Design Phase of a project.
• Interfaces with Director of Architecture and project managers.
• Works in tandem with highly collaborative multi-discipline design teams.
• Assists in research and coordination of materials and products for project specifications.

Other Benefits
1- Free accommodation, Water, Electricity
2- Over Time
3- Night Bonus
4- Insurance (Infinity Insurance)
5- 2 meals per day at the canteen, monthly meal deduction based on monthly attendant.
6- Free Laundry
Job Requirement:
Architect Qualifications / Skills:
• Ability to provide elegant and efficient design solutions
• Excellent oral and written communication
• Analytical and problem-solving skills
• High attention to detail
• Ability to work under indirect supervision
Effective interpersonal skills and collaborative management style to include teamwork and team building ability
• Comfortable with ambiguity and time spent outside of comfort zone acquiring new skills
• Technically creative and open-minded
Education, Experience, and Licensing Requirements:
• Bachelor’s or master’s degree in architecture from an accredited institution
• 3+ years of architectural experience preferably within the hiring firm’s field
• Understanding and knowledge of building codes, zoning regulations, building construction, building systems and site requirements
• Proficiency in Revit, AutoCAD, SketchUp, Photoshop, and Microsoft Office suite is required

Job Description:
Responsibilities:
• Prepare reports, designs, and drawings.
• Make calculations about pressures, loads, and stresses.
• Consider the strength of construction materials and select appropriately.
• Provide technical advice on safe designs and construction.
• Obtain planning and/or building regulations approval.
• Analyze configurations of the basic components of a structure.
• Liaise with professional staff such as architects and engineers.
• Monitor and inspect all work undertaken by contractors to ensure structural soundness.
• Administer contracts and manage projects.
• Inspect properties to evaluate the conditions and foundations.
• Use computer-aided design technology for simulation purposes.

Other Benefits
1- Free accommodation, Water, Electricity
2- Over Time
3- Night Bonus
4- Insurance (Infinity Insurance)
5- 2 meals per day at the canteen, monthly meal deduction based on monthly attendant.
6- Free Laundry
Job Requirement:
Structural Engineer Requirements:
• Degree in civil or structural engineering (essential).
• 3 years of work experience as a structural engineer (essential).
• Professionally registered with the Institute of structural engineers.
• Expert experience in project management.
• Advanced knowledge of construction methods, materials, and legal regulations.
• Sound understanding of physics and mathematics.
• Ability to liaise with professionals from other disciplines.
• Three-dimensional conceptual skills.
• Analytical thinker with strong problem-solving skills.
• Meticulous attention to detail with superb organizational skills.
• Ability to work under pressure and meet tight deadlines.
• Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
• Excellent communication and knowledge in structural design software e.g. STAAD and ETABS

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Established in 1996, Creed Group is a Japanese real estate investment group with a primary focus on the Southeast and South Asia real estate market. Our portfolio ranges from Real Estate Investment, Asset Management, Project Development to Property Management. To date, we have amassed an aggregate Gross Development Value (GDV) of US$800 million for our projects.
Before focusing on the emerging markets of Southeast and South Asia, we had amassed nearly 14 years of experience in the mature real estate market in Japan. Through our abundant expertise from Japan, and forming strategic partnerships with the best local players in respective countries, we are dedicated to providing the best Japanese quality development for promising emerging markets.
Currently, our business spans across 9 countries including Japan, Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Bangladesh, Myanmar, Lao PDR and Cambodia.

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
1. VISION:
“A leading Cambodian social microfinance institution working to achieve positive and lasting changes in the livelihoods of economically active poor families in a socially responsible manner”

2. MISSION:
“To improve the livelihoods, skills, and self-confidence of poor families in Cambodia by providing responsible microfinance and complementary socio-economic services”

3. CORE VALUES:
■ INTEGRITY: 
Chamroeun provides financial services and socio-economic services to its clients to enhance their well-being. It achieves this ethically and with transparent, fair, and cost effective methods. This manner is also applied to Chamroeun’s other stakeholders.

■ QUALITY OF SERVICES: 
At Chamroeun, we believe that our clients deserve tailored as well as efficient services. We provide these services in a convenient, proactive, and timely manner.

■ TRANSPARENCY: 
At Chamroeun, we provide our clients and other stakeholders with complete and accurate information about the terms and conditions of our products and services. Information is provided in a user-friendly manner to enable them to easily understand those terms and conditions.

■ FAIR PRACTICES: 
At Chamroeun, we ensure that the services we provide to our clients as well as the interactions we have with other stakeholders are not unethical or deceptive. We are committed to building relationships that are based on respect, fair treatments, and courtesy.

■ CONFIDENTIALITY: 
Privacy of our clients and other stakeholders is strictly safeguarded and stored, and such data is only used upon their consents, and they are well informed on specific purposes of data usage.

■ NON-DISCRIMINATION: 
Chamroeun considers its clients and other stakeholders as value assets and take all of efforts to make sure that the institution treats them in appropriate manner.
Contact Info: Contact Information Mrs. Nhong Korane  070 960 666 job@chamroeun.com #425, St. 271, Sangkat Toul Tompong II, Khan Chamkarmoan, Phnom Penh, Cambodia 070 960 666

Job Description:
- Oversee every transaction related to Stock of the company, both raw material and semi-final production stock
- Work closely with warehouse team, production team and erection team.
- Work station is mainly at warehouse to control the warehouse stock in and out based on Goods Received Note (GRN) and Goods Issue Note (GIN). And, work station can be at accounting department 1 or 2 days a week. 
- Spot check on the stock count confirm from warehouse team. 
- Analyze Stock reports to transfer raw materials to each project or expense and posting into QuickBooks under the correct Project/Department Codes.
- Prepare monthly stock and costing report
- Review construction plans, drawings and specifications for completion of quantitative take-offs by estimators i.e. Factory Manager, Site Manager and Project Coordinator
- Prepare preconstruction estimates schematic and designs, develop and manage cost estimating deliverables for full lifecycle project based on BoQ and unit cost of each quantity required
- Develop pricing and unit rates from understanding the concept of productivity rates in calculation of labor rates and overhead rates, and the average cost of each raw materials from the trends of materials purchases versus market price
- Update the costs and costs forecasts on a regular basis
- Produce bi-monthly reports on project monitory and review by comparing progress of construction to cost and activities, and follow relevant KPIs to proactively identify and manage financial risks
- Produce monthly inventory report of precast element produced for accounting to register inventory into company raw materials 
- Arrange for cost construction reports to be prepared and submitted at regular intervals including the estimated final cost of each project construction unit
- Work closely with the accounting team as well as the project management, the construction and the procurement team to report and provide feedback on the project status
- Other tasks assigned by AM and FM.
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor Degree in Accounting, Finance, and Related field
- 4- or 5-years’ experience in costing or financial analysis. Previous workplace construction company is preferred.  
- Understanding warehouse policy procedure, costing method and financial analysis.
- Male or Female.
- Hard working and honesty
- Good communication
- Proactive
- Positive thinking
- Self-drive
- Good command of English
- MS. Word, advance excel, QuickBooks, and other Stock Management system.

job title: Full-time System and Network Administration Trainer
position: Full-time System and Network Administration Trainer
Job Description:
2. CONTEXT AND MISSION
The System and Network Administration (SNA) trainer will be assigned to SNA team in training department of Passerelles numériques Cambodia.

The SNA trainer provides SNA training, follow up, and consult to the students in order to improve the learning of students to be fruitful. As well, produce documents in accordance with teaching methodology, pedagogy, and curriculum.

3. DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES
Under the supervision of SNA Coordinator, the SNA Trainer will be responsible for the following tasks:
Training Delivery 
▪ Prepare and deliver courses, homework, workshops and exams to students on some topics such as: Microsoft and Linux Operating Systems, Computer Architecture and Maintenance, Cisco, Mikrotik, Cloud Computing on AWS and Computer basic skills
▪ Identify the materials required for the practice of your course and manage it
▪ Participate to the design and updating of the IT training curriculum
▪ Ensure strong students follow up, identify and support the weak students, manage mark and action for your exam
▪ Keep abreast of technology in your field by reading current literature, talking with colleagues, and participating in professional conferences

Teaching Methodology
▪ Constantly improve the pedagogy and exchange with colleagues
▪ Collaborate with colleagues to address teaching issues
Others:
▪ Participate in social mission, tutorship, Virtual Company, and placement activities.
Job Requirement:
4. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
▪ Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or related field
▪ At least one year experience in teaching or working in the field of systems and networking
▪ Cisco CCNA, Linux, Cloud computing are the plus
▪ Strong interest in teaching 
▪ Flexible, critical thinking, creative, autonomous, open to criticism and team spirit
▪ Organized, rigorous, good communication, and eager to learn
▪ Very strong ethical behavior and leadership on his/her area of ownership
▪ Able to self-train quickly to new technologies

5. STATUS AND CONDITIONS
▪ Multicultural team setting (Khmer, Expats)
▪ Salary negotiated upon experience, paid leaves, skill development
▪ Start Date: January 2022

6. HOW TO APPLY
Interested individuals are invited to submit cover letter and CV (including your expected salary) to email below. Telephone: 023 99 55 00.

Job Description:
2. MISSION
The Communication and Events Officer will be assigned to support the External Relations Department of Passerelles numériques Cambodia.

The Communication and Events Officer is the one in charge of communication of the center in Cambodia. Communication and Events Officer will be reporting to External Relations Manager, working in the framework of PN Global Communication strategy. 

Objectives the Communication and Events Officer
- Increase the visibility of PN/PN Cambodia in the local community as well as 
  throughout Cambodia
- Promote an emotional and positive image of PN/PN Cambodia with the support of 
  External Relations team
- Support in fundraising campaign and projects 
- Host and manage all related PN Cambodia events (Career Forum, Sponsorship Handover…)

3. DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES

Under the supervision of External Relations Manager, the Communication and Events Officer will work in the team to:

* Social networks
- Contribute to the Facebook page for PN Cambodia (news, Welcome post, Friday quote, promoting our partners, etc.) according to PN guidelines
- Suggest ideas for increasing our online visibility.

* Fundraising Supports
- Support in fundraising campaigns through video production and photo design
- Support in raising awareness of PN Cambodia projects, and design strategy to promote each PN Cambodia fundraising campaigns

* Writing
- Contribute to PN newsletter (1 article in English, every 3 months).
- Conduct interviews (with students, alumni, local PN staff, volunteers, etc.).
- Contribute to the reports writing (annual and partner reports).

* Events coordination
- Organize or support other departments for local events (Career Forum, BarCamp, 
- Graduation ceremony, etc.)
- Produce communication tools (leaflet, agenda, poster, banners, press release, press 
- Review, video, photo gallery, taking picture)
- Be in charge of media relations, of dedicated social media

* Internal communication
- Contribute to and send the in-house newsletter (in English, once a week).
- Produce diplomas and certificates, 
- Support Solidarity Act project (wall of fame)

* Others 
- Take part in communication and external relations plan and initiatives
- Participate in Knowledge management (update our drives and tools)
- Organize, maintain and manage contact lists using Sales Force.
- Support ERO Officer in guidance to employment program and 
- Support PN Cambodia Alumni Association’s activities

To fulfill these objectives and carry out its tasks, the Communication and Events Officer will get support from the External Relations team and Global and PN Asia Communication team.
Job Requirement:
4. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
- Bachelor’s degree in business administration or English literature or communication or other equivalent degree 
- Fresh graduate or 1-year professional experience in Communication, Public Relations, or Sales and Marketing, 
- Skilled in photography, design tools, and video production
- Very good English writing skills 
- Eager to learn, to adapt to new situations and take up challenges
- Willingness to work in NGO environment/sensibility to social development problematic
- Able to self-train quickly to General IT Knowledge and IT situation in Cambodia
- Rigorous, well organized, autonomous and proactive
- Able to adapt to different environments and different cultures 
- Proficient in Microsoft Office: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, 
- Basic knowledge in Photoshop, and other Adobe Creative Suites is a good asset, but it is not a main requirement
- Dedicated and Committed to the tasks given

5. STATUS AND CONDITIONS
- Multicultural team setting (Khmer, French)
- Salary negotiated upon experience, paid leaves
- Start Date beginning of June (or earlier)

6. CONTACT – HOW TO APPLY

Job Description:
Objectives for external relations 
Increase the partnership opportunity of PN Cambodia with local companies/NGOs in terms of skills sharing, recruitment and sponsorship with the support of External Relations team


3. DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES
Under the supervision of the External Relation (ER) Manager, the External Relations Officer will work in the team to:

➢ Company visit:
- Establish plan/schedule/targeting companies for the study visit 
- Request/organize study visit for students
- Lead study visit at company/organization
- Manage the debriefing session after the study visit
- Partnership Building 
- Creation, maintenance and expansion of a sustainable relationship with companies, institutions, and organizations through face-to-face meetings, participating in external events, organizing guest’s visit at center, etc.
- Search/generate new contacts and bridge partnership,
- Support in local fundraising projects/campaigns.

➢ Internship placement
- Manage to place students for four-month full-time internship 
- Manage internship follow-up with students and companies
- Coordinate internship tutorship program
- Manage to conduct the survey with companies

➢ Job placement
- Manage to place students for full-time job 
- Manage employments follow-up with students
- PNCAA and Relation with Alumni
- Act as a proactive interface with the PNC Alumni Network and manage the Solidarity Act project,

➢ Others 
- Take part in external relations plan and initiatives,
- Participate in yearly/monthly planning input,
- Participate in Knowledge management (update our drives and tools),
- Organize, maintain and manage contact lists using Sales Force,
- Participate in PNC social mission, student selection, and virtual company,
- Support project teams and other tasks assigned by the Manager. 

To fulfill these objectives and carry out its tasks, the External Relations Officer will get support from the External Relations team.
Job Requirement:
4. SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
- Bachelor’s degree in any field. 
- Fresh graduates are encouraged to apply. 1 year experienced in Public Relations, Sales and Marketing; and Communication preferred.
- Good at English writing skills
- Good at interpersonal and communication skills  
- Eager to learn, to adapt to new situations and take up challenges
- Willingness to work in NGO environment/sensibility to social development problematic
- Able to self-train quickly to General IT Knowledge and IT situation in Cambodia
- Rigorous, well organized, autonomous and proactive
- Able to adapt to different environments and different cultures 
- Proficient in Microsoft Office: Excel, Word, PowerPoint, 
- Basic knowledge in Photoshop, and another Adobe Creative Suite is a good asset, but it is not a main requirement
- Dedicated and Committed to the tasks given

5. STATUS AND CONDITIONS
- Multicultural team setting (Khmer, French)
- Salary negotiated upon experience, paid leaves
- Start Date beginning of November (or earlier)

6. CONTACT – HOW TO APPLY

Job Description:

• ទទួលបណ្ណស្នើសុំពីផ្នែកផ្សេងៗសិក្សា និងដោះស្រាយការងារគម្រោងនីមួយៗឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា។
• រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារនៅពេលចាប់ផ្តើមការងារ និងបន្ទាប់ពីបញ្ចប់ការងារត្រូវថតរបាយការណ៍ផ្ញើមកប្រធានផ្នែកផ្ទាល់ នៅក្នុងក្រុមតេលេក្រាម។
• រៀងរាល់ចុងខែ ត្រូវបញ្ជូនរបាយការណ៍ការងារសរុបប្រចាំខែ មកជំនួយការប្រធានផ្នែក។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវការងារខ្លួនឯងពីតាំងពីចាប់ផ្ដើម រហូតដល់បញ្ចប់ការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើកាសិក្សាគម្រោងការងារឱ្យមាន គុណភាព តម្លៃសមរម្យ សោភ័ណ្ឌភាពស្អាត។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវរៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ការងារគម្រោងតាមបណ្ណស្នើសុំ ភ្ជាប់ជាមួយនិងបណ្ណការងារ។
• ទទួលខុសត្រូវលើសម្ភារដែលបើកចេញពីស្តុក និងសម្ភារអ្នកស្នើសុំដាក់ទិញប្រើប្រាស់ក្នុងគម្រោង។
• ចូលរួមសហការការងារជាមួយបុគ្គលិកក្នុងផ្នែកទាំងអស់រាល់សកម្មភាពការងារប្រចាំថ្ងៃពេលមានតម្រូវការងារពីថ្នាក់លើ។
• ត្រួតពិនិត្យបញ្ជីឧបករណ៍ក្នុងផ្នែកជាមួយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រងស្តុក។

Job Requirement:

• ចេះគូរគំនូរព្រះបត់

• ចេះគូរគំនូរ 3D

• មានភាពស្មោះត្រង់ និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់ក្នុងការងារ។
• ការត្រួតពិនិត្យគុណភាពការងារ។

Company Profile:
Mengly J. Quach Education (MJQE) is known as a unique education system for its superior quality, discipline and services. It is remarkably consistent with the use creative, innovative, and critical thinking to make a difference for our young generations. We are always optimistic that our standard system will surly provide the best education for our kids and help shape their life to act with respect towards themselves.

MJQE is in a restructuring period of change. MJQE focuses its efforts to ensure all students have the academic and personal skills required to succeed in college and life. Currently, MJQE is one of the 4 companies in the MJQ Group (MJQ Education, Prasethpheap Finance, MJQ Travel and the Mengly J. Quach Media Network (MMN)). MJQ Education has 4 school-companies (Aii Language Center (Aii), American Intercon School (AIS), Go Overseas Study Overseas (SOGO) and i-Learn). There are 7 campuses of Aii and 8 campuses of AIS throughout Cambodia serving more than 17,000 students with more than 500,000 alumni since 2005. 

The MJQE is committed to building talented and committed students and providing the appropriate supports to schools to ensure all students can be successful.

MJQE is an Equal Opportunity Employer. MJQE ensures equal employment opportunities regardless of race, creed, sex, color, national origin, religion, age, sexual orientation, disability, citizenship status, political affiliation, marital status or other human differences. MJQE has a policy of active recruitment of qualified minority employees.
Our Benefits:
Competitive salary 
- Scholarship for employee, employee's children, and spouse 
- NSSF and 24 - hour worldwide accident insurance 
- Maternity, paternity, and marriage benefits
- Benefits as compliance to Prakas of Ministry of Labor and Vocational Training 
- Career advancement opportunities 
- Training opportunities for professional development 
- Annual salary increment based on experience and performance review.

job title: ជាងអគ្គិសនី
company_name: Mong Reththy Investment Cambodia Oil Palm Co., Ltd.
position: ជាងអគ្គិសនី
Job Description:
** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- ថែទាំជួសជុល កែតម្រូវទូទៅ
- រៀបចំប្រព័ន្ធថែទាំការពារឧបករណ៍អគ្គិសនី
- ជួសជុលការខូចខាត ឧបករណ៍និងប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី
- គ្រប់គ្រងនិងត្រួតពិនិត្យប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី
Job Requirement:
** លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស៖
- តម្រូវការមានកំរិតវប្បធម៌ថ្នាក់បរិញ្ញាបត្រ បរិញ្ញាបត្ររង និង វគ្គបណ្តុះបណ្តាលវិជ្ជាជីវៈបច្ចេកទេសផ្នែកអគ្គិសនី
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ ២ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ ជាមួយនឹងការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- ចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកកុំព្យូទ័រដូចជាកម្មវិធី Word, Excel, Power Point និង Email
- ចេះអាននិងគូសប្លង់ប្រព័ន្ធអគ្គិសនី
- អាចធ្វើការទៅតាមពេលវាលា និងទីកន្លែងដែលបានចាត់តាំង
- មានការតាំងចិត្តខ្ពស់និងអាកប្បកិរិយាវិជ្ជមាន
- ស្មោះត្រង់, ខិតខំធ្វើការងារ,​ មានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនិងធ្វើការជាក្រុម
- អាចស្នាក់នៅនិងធ្វើការបាននៅកន្លែងដាច់ស្រយាល

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលនឹងទទួលបាន៖
- មានផ្តល់ជូនប្រាក់បៀវត្សសមរម្យ
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាព
- គ្រោះថ្នាក់ផ្សេងៗនិងការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព
- មានផលប្រយោជន៍ជាកញ្ចប់សម្រាប់ថែទាំសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក-កម្មក
- មានផ្តល់កន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ និងទឹកភ្លើង
- ​អនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់ការងាររបស់ប្រទេសកម្ពុជា

job title: គិលានុបដ្ឋាក(Nurse)

position: គិលានុបដ្ឋាក(Nurse)
Job Description:
** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- ពិនិត្យជំងឺ និង ចេះហ្វឹកហាត់ពីការសង្រោះបឋមដល់បុគ្គលិក-កម្មករ
- ពិនិត្យគុណភាពថ្នាំ និង គ្រឿងបរិក្ខាពេទ្យ
- រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ប្រចាំខែទាក់ទងនៅការចំណាយរបស់ផ្នែកគិលានដ្ឋាន
- ភារកិច្ចផ្សេងទៀតដែលបានផ្ដល់ដោយអ្នកគ្រប់គ្រង
Job Requirement:
** លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស៖
- បញ្ចប់ថ្នាក់ពេទ្យបឋម ឬ ផ្នែកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ទាក់ទង ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅទាក់ទងនឹងផ្នែកនេះ
- មានទំនាក់ទំនងល្អ និងជំនាញធ្វើការងារជាក្រុម
- និយាយ‌ អាន និងសរសេរភាសាអង់គ្លេសបាន
- ចេះប្រើកុំព្យូទ័រ (Microsoft office)‌ Internet and E-mail
- មានផ្តល់ជូនប្រាក់បៀវត្សតាមទីផ្សារប្រកួតប្រជែង កន្លែងស្នាក់នៅសមរម្យ ទឹកភ្លើងប្រើប្រាស់ដោយឥតគិតថ្លៃ

*** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលនឹងទទួលបាន៖
- សោហ៊ុយធ្វើដំណើរ ថ្លៃអាហារ ដំឡើងប្រាក់បៀវត្សតាមផលិតភាពការងារប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​ ប្រាក់រង្វន់លើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ​
- ធានារ៉ាប់រងលើគ្រោះថ្នាក់ផ្សេងៗ២៤ម៉ោង ធានារ៉ាប់រងលើសុខភាព និងអត្ថប្រយោជន៍ផ្សេងៗទៀត
- មានឱកាសទទួលបានការបណ្តុះបណ្តាល និងអភិវឌ្ឍវីជ្ជាជីវៈ

Job Description:
Key Responsibilities:
- Order generation & 100% achievement of target as per BP commitment and Executed plan as per commitment
- Territory promotions planned, executed, approved by manager/ASM
- Conduct regular visit to retail outlet to ensure order generation & excellent service delivery is provided
- Maintain account development as per PixOS and
- Achieved PixOS outlet target & RED tracking outlets as per plan
- Follow up RED to do list with sales rep improved RED score & conformity score
- Ensure cooler are cleaned, pure, good location & ON, and - 100% achievement of merchandising target
- Monthly & Weekly build bottom up RE
- Monitor trends and report immediately to commercial planning manager to ensure production can procedure to demand
- Implemented project as per plan & approved by distributor manager
- Deviation identified, reported and action plan within agreed with distributor manager
- Submitted budget to distributor for approval
- All over spent items to be justified or corrected
- Monitored expenses against budget and 100% compliance to finance policies & procedures
- Managed Distributor Channel Phnom Penh
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s degree in Sales and Marketing or equivalent.
- At least two years’ experience in Sales or Marketing from FMCG.
- Good communication and negotiation skill.
- Good interpersonal and be flexible.
- Able to communicate in English.
Company Profile:
Cambodia Beverage Company Ltd (CBC) referred too locally as Coca-Cola Cambodia is a leading manufacturer & distributor of non-alcoholic ready to drink (NARTD) beverages throughout Cambodia. With our state-of-the-art bottling plant (commissioned in 2016) situated within PPSEZ, one of the leading Economic Zones in Phnom Penh.

The company produces 16 different beverages, under 8 brands, and within 5 different NARTD categories (Sparkling, Tea, Energy, Water, and Isotonic) which is supplied to our customers throughout the Kingdom.
CBC directly employs more than 850 staff while creating indirect employment opportunities for another 8,000+ staff across the Kingdom.

We are proud that >99.7% of our workforce are Cambodian nationals and that >31% of our staff are female, with women making up 37% of the senior management team. We are committed to increasing our female diversity and are targeting to have 50% female staff by 2030.
We are committed to integrating sustainability into everything we do.

By 2030 we aim to collect and recycle a bottle or can for each one we sell by 2030 and use at least 50% recycled material in our packaging.
We are committed to return to nature and communities 100%+ of the water we use in our drinks and their production. We are working to increase water security where we operate, source ingredients, and touch people's lives.

job title: ជាងជុសជុលរថយន្ត (Mechanic)
company_name: Mong Reththy Investment Cambodia Oil Palm Co., Ltd.
position: ជាងជុសជុលរថយន្ត (Mechanic)
Job Description:
** កាតព្វកិច្ច និងការទទួលខុសត្រូវ៖
- ជុសជុលរថយន្ត និងគ្រឿងចក្រក្នុងក្រុមហ៊ុន
- ជួយការងារផ្សា និងតោនរថយន្ត និងគ្រឿងចក្រ
- ធ្វើរបាយការណ៍ជុសជុលប្រចាំថ្ងៃ
- ធ្វើការងារផ្សេងទៀតតាមការចាត់តាំងរបស់ប្រធានផ្នែក។
Job Requirement:
** លក្ខខណ្ឌជ្រើសរើស៖
- មានសញ្ញាបត្របច្ចេកទេស ឬសញ្ញាបត្រដែលមានតម្លៃស្មើ
- មានបទពិសោធន៍ ១ឆ្នាំឡើងទៅ ជាមួយនឹងការងារពាក់ព័ន្ធ
- មានចំណេះដឹងផ្នែកថែទាំរថយន្ត និងគ្រឿងចក្រ
- ស្មោះត្រង់, ខិតខំធ្វើការងារ, មានការទំនាក់ទំនងល្អនិងធ្វើការជាក្រុម។

** អត្ថប្រយោជន៍ដែលនឹងទទួលបាន៖
- មានផ្តល់ជូនប្រាក់បៀវត្សសមរម្យ
- ប្រាក់លើកទឹកចិត្តប្រចាំឆ្នាំ
- ប្រាក់អតីតភាព
- គ្រោះថ្នាក់ផ្សេងៗនិងការធានារ៉ាប់រងសុខភាព
- មានផលប្រយោជន៍ជាកញ្ចប់សម្រាប់ថែទាំសុខភាពដល់បុគ្គលិក-កម្មក
- មានផ្តល់កន្លែងស្នាក់នៅ និងទឹកភ្លើង
- អនុវត្តតាមច្បាប់ការងាររបស់ប្រទេសកម្ពុជា។

Job Description:
Duties and responsibilities 
•Monitor instructional and managerial processes to ensure that program activities are related to program outcomes and use findings to take corrective actions.
•Regularly consult the campus-level committee about planning, operation, supervision, and evaluation of campus education program. Include students and community representatives when appropriate.
•Provide instructional resources and materials to support teaching staff in accomplishing instructional goals.
•Provide for two-way communication with superintendent, staff, students, parents, and community.
•Communicate and promote expectations for high-level performance to staff and students. Recognize excellence and achievement.
•Ensure the effective and quick resolution of conflicts.
•Build common vision for school improvement with staff. Direct planning activities and put programs in place with staff to ensure attainment of school’s mission.
•Identify, analyze, and apply research findings (e.g., effective school correlates) to promote school improvement. 
•Develop and set annual campus performance objectives for each of the Academic Excellence Indicators using the campus planning process and site-based decision making committee.
•Develop, maintain, and use information systems and records necessary to show campus progress on performance objectives addressing each Academic Excellence Indicator.
•Other relevant tasks are assigned by VP&COO and VP&CFO
Job Requirement:
•Master’s/Bachelor’s in Education or related fields.
•At Least three years in campus management
•Special Knowledge/Skills: 
-Strong understanding in Academic Skill
-Working knowledge of curriculum and instruction. 
-Ability to evaluate instructional program and teaching effectiveness.
-Ability to manage budget and personnel Ability to coordinate campus functions. 
-Ability to implement policy and procedures Ability to interpret data. 
-Strong organizational, communication, public relations, and interpersonal skills
•Knowledge of computer word, excel and power point
•Good communication skill, negotiation skill and problem solving
•Good at Presentation Skill

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Company Profile:
Mega Asset Management Co., Ltd is a leading consulting company founded since 2008, specialized in Real Estate Development with many prestigious projects on hands. We are managing Property and Asset including Overseas Cambodia Investment Corporation (OCIC) or Chroy Chang Va Satellite City, Diamond Island City, Olympia City, Condominium, Wedding hall, Exhibition Center, Hotel, Construction, Infrastructure, Agricultural business and so on.

Our vision
To be the leading consultant company for Real Estate Development, Property and Asset Management.  

Our Mission
To provide professional experts and to be the partner of choice with value-added management in all the areas of real estates development and property and asset management.
Contact Info: Contact Information HR Department  078 882 555 / 087 882 555 recruitment@mam.com.kh Canadia Tower at 10th floor No. 315, Ang Duong Street, (Corner of Monivong Blvd ), Phnom Penh, Cambodia 078 882 555 / 087 882 555

Job Description:
-	Updating actual cost to cost monitoring for Elite Town 3, Olympia city C7, and Cana industrial park (project N51) monthly
-	Updating percentage completion from inspector to cost monitoring for Elite Town 3, Olympia city C7, and Cana industrial park (project N51) monthly
-	Updating (BOQ) from site to cost monitoring whenever have new blocks
-	Investigating under/overrun budget
-	Updating sale report to revenue recognition for Elite Town 3 and Olympia City C7 quarterly
-	Updating overhead (OHD absorption) to revenue recognition for Elite Town 3 and Olympia City C7 quarterly.
-	Prepare Cost Monitoring Reports of project Cana Industrial Park Elite Town 3 and Olympia City C7 ( Monthly)
-	Prepare revenue recognition reports of project Elite Town 3 and Olympia City ( Quarterly )
Job Requirement:
-	Bachelor degree of Accounting and Finance or Education in English Literature
-	Two years' experience related to financial management field
-	ACCA F7 Finance Reporting
-	ACCA F5 Performance Manager
-	Advance Excel

Job Description:
- Ensure competent quality execution of all regular purchasing duties and administrative works.
- Maintain complete updated purchasing records/data and pricing in the system.
- Schedule store visits and conduct competitor survey.
- Coordinate with user departments and suppliers in the purchasing scope of work for projects assigned.
- Support relevant departments with quotations for the purpose of tenders.
- Coordinate with suppliers to ensure on-time delivery.
- Responsible for the preparation and process purchase orders and documents in accordance with company policies and procedures.
- Monitor and co-ordinate deliveries of items between suppliers to ensure that all items are delivered to site on time.
- Purchase and issue order in accordance to specification.
- Select and negotiate for the best purchase package in terms of quality, price, terms, deliveries and services with suppliers.
Job Requirement:
- 1 - 2 years experiences in Accountant, Finance or related fields.
- Good oral and written communication skills.
- Good Command in English and Chinese is an advantage.
- Computer skills, including Ms. Word, Outlook and Excel.
- Good interpersonal, presentation and communication skills.
- Experience in import/export or Forwarding Company is advantage.
- Willing to travel and work in provinces.

Job Description:
•	Update new law & regulations as per announcement from Ministry of Land Management for implementation on time.
•	Ensure corporate operations in compliance with local law and regulations
•	Providing legal advice which includes drafting reviewing contracts and negotiation, other relevant documents, regulatory work associated with general business transactions,
•	Oversees employee schedules to ensure coverage of front desk and attorney’s needs.

•	Provides supervisory oversight for the administrative support team for the Legal Services function.

•	Bachelor Degree or Master degree of Law
•	At least 2 or 3 years in Legal 
•	Strong team working skills
•	Active and willing to learn
•	Good communication
•	Willing to work under pressure

Job Description:
- Plan and organize administrative support activities
- Oversee other requests to submit to the finance department
- Oversee office renovation and maintenance project, manage fleet
- Manage overall administration works including office phone, Internet, electricity and water bill, parking card, office stationaries, insurance declaration…etc. 
- Ensure that the office is always maintained in a high standard of cleaning and safe
- Ensure all equipment’s and working tools are ready before the starting date of new employees
- Coordinate with finance team to ensure all company fixed assets are well recorded and updated
- To monitor and follow up the work discipline Vs internal regulation and any policies
- Oversee the security and cleaning of each business
- Working closely with HR Team for any specific supports and requirements
- Arrange and monitor delivery and receive goods schedule
- To build good relationship within and with Cross Department to insure the stability of operation
- Other tasks assigned by supervisor
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor degree in business administration and other related field is preferred
- At least 2 years’ experiences from administrative 
- Have good communication skills and be able to involve with problem solving
- Good negotiation skills, interpersonal skills, problem solving skills;
- Be friendly, flexible, honestly, hard-working, and be able to work under the pressure
- Good at Ms. office Word & Excel

Job Description:
1. Daily Finance Operation Supporting:
 Daily Finance Operation Supporting
o Check supported all necessary documents, processed and certified for invoice or receipt of merchandises or services in quality, quantity and prices
o Check invoices or receipt for daily, weekly and monthly that collected from relevant department
o Check invoices or receipt are completed supporting document PR, PO, quote, DO, MR, etc
o To ensure daily recording transactions properly and accurately
o Fully understand and comply with company and finance P & P
o To be responsible for all inter-company accounts 
o Supporting document has been filling for audit purpose
o To be responsible for all financial supporting
 Fixed Assets
o Ensure Fixed assets listing has been recording properly 
o Assets registration (Coding)
o Manage Fixed Asset Movement
o Handling Disposal Process
o Prepare month-end journal
o Conduct Physical Count

2. Prepare Financial Monthly Report:
o Assist for prepare Monthly Financial Report P&L, BS, CF with Financial Note to comply with Cambodia IFRS
o Assist for reconciled Financial Reports
o Produce monthly Aging AP / AR report 

3. Other Financial Supporting Operation: 
o Support for other management reports

4. Accounting System knowledge
o To use accounting system

5. Soft Skill
o Honest and responsive
o Team player
o Fast learner and willing to learn
o Well communicate with external and internal
o Accepts advise and change for self-improvement.
Job Requirement:
• At least one years working experience in Accounting/Finance or related field
• Proven working experience in construction company is a plus
• Proven supervisory experience
• Proven working internal and external customer
• Knowledge in accounting software (Prefer QuickBooks).
• Good at MS Office Word & Excel Skills. 
o Good at documentation skills,
o Good at time management skills,
o Good in English Language.
o English language proficiency.
o NAV System is priority.

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs

- Selecting tools and materials

- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk

- Graduated in Civil Engineering

- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

position: Teaching Assistant ជំនួយការគ្រូបង្រៀន
Job Description:
- Assist the class supporter to enable the effectiveness of classroom management
- Manage and prepare the classroom materials with guidance from lead teacher
- To assist the lead teacher in the preparation and maintenance Montessori play learning center
- Organizing and attending parent-teacher meeting quarterly regularly
- Supervise kids in the class, schoolyard or tutor students and kids’ arrival
- Sensitivity and patience are key assets
Job Requirement:
- Bachelor’s Degree or university student of any fields
- Knowledge of Microsoft Office (Word, Excel, PowerPoint…)
- Able to write, read and speak English; Chinese is a plus
- Work independence and self-management
- Excellent teamwork and team building skills
- Strong desire to learn and commit to his/her further development
- Ability to work under pressure and be flexible

** How to Apply
Interested candidates are invited to apply via the contact bellows: 
- Tel : 015/089625000
- Address: 
- Email: hr@zhongying.edu.kh
- Closing date: One Month

Job Description:
-	Control Cost (Actual Cost to fit Planned Cost)
-	Lead on preparing Material Quantity for Procurement
-	Lead and Manage document for subcontractors
-	Monitor Project QS for all construction site
-	Control and manage on Construction Cost and Planning
-	Ensure clear definition of the Planning requirements of assigned projects 
-	Ensure all team is adherence by the Site Construction Team, Design and Procurement Department to all the issued planning documents and procedures
-	Preparation of independent Design, Procurement, Quantity Survey Schedules that are forming part of the Overall Project Master Schedule
-	Application of all planning aspects as appropriate and in accordance with the approved Overall project Master Schedule.
-	Ensure that, at all times, the Site Construction Team are fully aware of the project targets, project current status, exceptions to plan, required remedial action and forecast(s) for recovery to the plan
-	Ensure that CEO and Technical Director are aware of any potential major problems, and to propose remedial action, i.e. to initiate an "Early Warning" system for preventive action
-	Review progress and performance updates with the Site Construction Team, Design and procurement teams to identify adverse trends in progress and both manhour and Construction equipment expenditure
-	Monitor progress of all project work carried out in relation to the Project Master Schedule and identify potential delays to performance of any project work.
-	Progress Report (Weekly, Monthly)
Job Requirement:
-	Master or bachelor degree in Civil Engineering or another relevant field;
-	Extensive experience in MS. Project and MS. Office
-	Practical in management role in Planning/QS/PM at least 5 years in managing various sites
-	Team player with commitment to identify, analyze and propose solutions to problems in a constructive and positive manner.
-	Extensive experience of progress measurement processes.
-	Able to quickly assimilate changes into project schedules and identify key project risks.
-	Able to work under pressure and within tight working schedules.
-	Good in both speaking and writing Khmer and English
-	Be a problem solver, able to work under pressure with high responsibility

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description:
-	ធ្វើផែនការការងារ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យផ្ទាល់ ផ្នែកសាងសង់ និងស្ថាបត្យកម្ម
-	តាមដាតដំណើរការសាងសង់អោយបានខ្ជាប់ខ្ជួន
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យ បច្ចេកទេសនិង គុណភាពការងារសាងសង់របស់ក្រុមជាងអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវ
-	វាយតម្លៃការងារ និង ការឡើងលុយអោយក្រុមម៉ៅការ
-	ត្រួតពិនិត្យការប្រើប្រាស់ និងទុកដាក់សំភារះរបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនហើយប្រើប្រាស់កុំអោយលើសស្ដង់ដារ (ប្រើខ្ជះខ្ជាយ និងបាត់បង់)
-	រៀបចំសណ្ដាប់ធ្នាប់ និងអនាម័យការដ្ឋាន
-	ដោះស្រាយបញ្ហាការងារផ្សេងៗ ដែលកើតមាននៅក្នុងការដ្ឋាន
-	សហការការងារជាក្រុមតែមួយ
-	រក្សាការសំងាត់របស់ក្រុមហ៊ុន និងក្រុមការងារ
-	មិនត្រូវកេងប្រវ៉ាញក្រុមហ៊ុន (មិនពុករលួយ)
-	មិនយកការងារខាងក្រៅមកធ្វើក្នុងម៉ោងការងារ
-	គោរពបទបញ្ជាការងារ
-	រៀបចំរបាយការណ៍ ចំនួនជាងកម្មករ និងទិន្ន័យការងារជារៀងរាល់ថ្ងៃធ្វើការ
Job Requirement:
-	ភេទប្រុស អាយុចាប់ពី ២២ឆ្នាំ ដល់៣៥ឆ្នាំ
-	មានសញ្ញាប័ត្រ ផ្នែកសំណង់ (បញ្ចប់ការសិក្សាហើយ)
-	អាចប្រើប្រាស់ កម្មវិធី Auto CAD, Word, Excel
-	មានបទពិសោធន៍ យ៉ាងតិច ២ ឆ្នាំនៃជំនាញ
-	មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវលើការងារ
-	មានការសហការជាក្រុមបាន
-	អាចធ្វើការបត់បែនតាមកាលះទេសះ តំរូវការពីការដ្ឋាន

Job Description:
1. Audit on Workers and staff movement from all sites
-Daily monitoring report for new joiner and resign of workers from assigned sites.
-Daily monitoring report update for employee resignation from assigned sites. 

2. Audit on Workers and staff attendance 
-Daily monitor workers attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites. 
-Daily monitor employee attendance and OT report to C&B HQ from assigned sites.

3. Monitor site admin performance 
-Audit work performance of assigned site admin by roaster.
-Assessment work quality of assigned site admin under managing.

4. Review Site Admin Policy
-Implement and train site admin to understand the policy and relevant update.
-Train Site Admin workflow and SOP 

5. Committee for site inspection
-Participate for site inspections on workers/ employee at the site. 
-Participate for site committee problem solving/Investigation.
-Monthly report and inspection result.
6. New project assignment.
-Participate to roll out new assign project.
-Participate all HR activities
7. Employee working accessories
-Monitor assigned site for office stationary stock in and out.
-Review assigned site of employee purchase request from the site.
-Review assigned site of employee uniforms at the site.
Job Requirement:
• Over 2 years of work experience in Site Admin
• Fluent in English Language
• MS Office & Email
• Experiencing working at construction company
• Strong skills MS. Office.
• Understand technical language of construction.
• Understand construction work progress and flow.
• Strong skills in reporting
• Strong skills in social communication tools
• Strong skills in problem analyzing

Job Description: តួនាទី និងទំនួលខុសត្រូវ•រៀបចំផែនការ និងធ្វើបទបង្ហាញមេរៀនដើម្បីជួយសម្រួលដល់ការយល់ដឹង និងការអនុវត្ត របស់សិស្ស•រៀបចំ និងដាក់អោយសិស្សនូវកំណត់ចំណាំ លំហាត់ កិច្ចការសាលា និងកម្រងសំណួរផ្សេងៗ•ស្វែងរកឯកសារ ឬ សម្ភារៈដែលចាំបាច់សម្រាប់មេរៀន•ធានាថាថ្នាក់រៀននៅតែមានសុវត្ថិភាព និងអំណោយផលដល់ការសិក្សា•ចាត់ថ្នាក់កិច្ចការរបស់សិស្ស និង កម្រងសំណួរឱ្យទាន់ពេលវេលា•ធ្វើជាអនុរក្សនៅពេលដែលមានសំណួរ ឬ ប្រលងប្រចាំខែ/បញ្ចប់វគ្គ•ចងក្រងជាឯកសារ និងរាយការណ៍អំពីភាពរីកចម្រើនរបស់សិស្ស•ផ្តល់ឱ្យសិស្សគ្រប់រូបនូវការដោះស្រាយបញ្ហា និង លើកទឹកចិត្តពួកគេឱ្យសម្រេចបាននូវ សក្តានុពលរបស់ពួកគេ•អភិវឌ្ឍការយល់ដឹងរបស់សិស្សមិនត្រឹមតែក្នុងមេរៀន ប៉ុណ្ណោះ ប៉ុន្តែថែមទាំងក្នុងបរិបទធំទូលាយក្នុងសង្គមដើម្បីអភិវឌ្ឍសិស្សក្នុងសកម្មភាពសិក្សា បន្ថែមទាក់ទងនឹងគណិតវិទ្យា និងរូបវិទ្យា •វិនិយោគពេលវេលាបន្ថែមលើការបង្រៀនដើម្បីធានាថា សិស្សទទួលបានការរៀនប្រកបដោយ ស្តង់ដារ•មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ។មានឆន្ទៈក្នុងការធ្វើការជាមួយបុគ្គលិកដែលពាក់ព័ន្ធ•ធ្វើកិច្ចការផ្សេងទៀតដែលចាត់ចែងដោយប្រធានផ្នែកកម្មវិធីសិក្សាHow to applyInterested applicants are invited to submit your updated CV and Cover Letter to E-mail: zhongying2022@gmail.comTel/Telegram: 015 62 5000
Job Requirement: តម្រូវការការងារ•បរិញ្ញាបត្រផ្នែកអប់រំជាមួយជំនាញឯកទេស•មានបទពិសោធន៍បង្រៀនយ៉ាងតិច ១ឆ្នាំ•មានទំនាក់ទំនងខាងផ្នែកនិយាយ និងសរសេរល្អ។•មានការរៀបចំបានល្អ និងអាចបត់បែនបានតាមកាលៈទេសៈ។•មានជំនាញទំនាក់ទំនងល្អប្រសើរ។•គាំទ្រពីបេសកកម្ម និងគុណតម្លៃស្នូលរបស់សាលាអន្តរជាតិ ចុងអ៊ីង •មានជំនាញក្នុងការបង្រៀន រៀបចំមេរៀន សម្ភារបង្រៀននិងមានជំនាញក្នុងការគ្រប់គ្រងថ្នាក់រៀន•មានកាយល់ដឹងអំពីការវិវត្តរបស់សិស្ស និងយកមកអនុវត្តតាមទ្រឹស្តីនៃការអប់រំបានត្រឹមត្រូវ•ចេះភាសាអង់គ្លេស អាចប្រើប្រាស់បានកាន់តែប្រសើរ•ចេះប្រើប្រាស់កុំព្យូទ័រ ដូចជា Microsoft Office និង Email ជាដើមរបៀបដាក់ពាក្យបេក្ខជន-បេក្ខនារី ដែលមានសម្ថភាពអាចដាក់ពាក្យតាមរយៈអ៊ីម៉ែល ឬតេលេហ្រ្កាមខាងក្រោម ៖E-mail:  hr@zhongying.edu.khTel/Telegram: 015 62 5000

Job Description:
- Supervising and overseeing the direction of the project (or a package), ensuring that the client’s specifications and requirements are met, reviewing progress and liaising with quantity surveyors to monitor costs
- Coordinating and supervising construction workers
- Selecting tools and materials
- Making safety inspections and ensuring construction and site safety
- Checking and preparing site reports, designs and drawings
- Writing reports and keeping on top of paperwork
- Assessing and minimizing risk
Job Requirement:
- Graduated in Civil Engineering
- At least 5 years’ experiences in related field
- At lease 3 year's experiences in site management role
- Good communication in English
- Good in computer skill (Microsoft Office, AutoCAD, …)
- Good in leadership skill and problem solving
- Hard working and team work

Company Profile:
From a very humble beginning as a small roofing sheet roll former in 1997, ISI STEEL, A member of ISI GROUP, has successfully transformed itself from a family-run business into a midsize corporation leading Cambodia's steel processing industry. With modern processing facilities, world-class management systems and technology, dedicated staff and nationwide distribution networks serving our customers nationwide, ISI STEEL has become a truly reliable and respectable local brand synonymous with quality roofing and wall cladding systems and structural steel products.

This would not have been possible without the strong support of our customers, local and international business partners, our staff's dedication and hard work, and last but not least the government efforts for maintaining the political stability and sustainable economic growth. To ensure our company’s sustainable development and industry-leading position, we are committed to further invest in upgrading our manufacturing facilities, expanding our distribution network, building up our human capital, technology infrastructure, and product innovations to better meet our customer's need and expectation.

While continuing to strengthen our core capabilities in the manufacturing and distribution of quality coated steel products, we have over the years ventured into a number of related diversifications such as pre-engineering steel building fabrication, property development including industrial park, residential, offices and resorts developments, and other construction materials trading business through our subsidiary and affiliated companies to capture the opportunities in the growing economy of Cambodia.

Company Profile:
Rolya Microfinance Institution PLC was incorporated locally under the laws and regulations of the Kingdom of Cambodia. The institution was licensed by the National Bank of Cambodia as a Microfinance Institution under Parkas M.F 87 on 18 July 2018, and started its operations the following months.

MFI’s license states that the institution can engage in “Loans to Small and Medium Enterprises (SME), trade, agriculture and small businesses from its capital resources, and offer other cash services related to its main activities”. Rolya Microfinance Institution Plc is an integral part of Cambodian MFI sector.
